8032446Di2015UniqueSeparatorstring strInput = Console.ReadLine();Di2015NewLinestring[] strItems = new string[] { "1", "2", "3", "4", "5" };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineint removeIndex = Array.IndexOf(strItems, strInput);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineif (removeIndex >= 0)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // declare and define a new array one element shorter than the old arrayDi2015NewLine    string[] newStrItems = new string[strItems.Length - 1];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // loop from 0 to the length of the new array, with i being the positionDi2015NewLine    // in the new array, and j being the position in the old arrayDi2015NewLine    for (int i = 0, j = 0; i < newStrItems.Length; i++, j++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // if the index equals the one we want to remove, bumpDi2015NewLine        // j up by one to "skip" the value in the original arrayDi2015NewLine        if (i == removeIndex)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            j++;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // assign the good element from the original array to theDi2015NewLine        // new array at the appropriate positionDi2015NewLine        newStrItems[i] = strItems[j];Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // overwrite the old array with the new oneDi2015NewLine    strItems = newStrItems;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

8035156Di2015UniqueSeparator    static readonly Regex VectorRegex = new Regex(@"a:(?<A>[0-9]+\\.[0-9]+);b:(?<B>[0-9]+\\.[0-9]+);c:(?<C>[0-9]+\\.[0-9]+)", RegexOptions.Compiled);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static Tuple<double, double, double> ParseVector(string input)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var m = VectorRegex.Match(input);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (m.Success)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            double a, b, c;Di2015NewLine            a = double.Parse(m.Groups["A"].Value, System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.InvariantInfo);Di2015NewLine            b = double.Parse(m.Groups["B"].Value, System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.InvariantInfo);Di2015NewLine            c = double.Parse(m.Groups["C"].Value, System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.InvariantInfo);Di2015NewLine            return new Tuple<double, double, double>(a, b, c);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine            throw new FormatException("Invalid input format");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

8043011Di2015UniqueSeparator// finds the successor of nodeDi2015NewLineprocedure successor(node) Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // assuming you have the node for the id that you know.Di2015NewLine    // also I'm assuming you have some way to find its position Di2015NewLine    // in the child listDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // if the parent has a child to the rightDi2015NewLine    if(parent(node).children[position(node) + 1] != null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return findLeftmost(parent(node).children[position(node) + 1]);Di2015NewLine        // find the leftmost node in the subtree rooted Di2015NewLine        // at the next sibling to the  rightDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return successor(parent(node));Di2015NewLine        // move up the treeDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// finds the leftmost leaf node of the (sub)tree rooted at nodeDi2015NewLineprocedure findLeftmost(node)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if(node.children.length == 0) // leaf nodeDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return node;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return findLeftmost(node.children[0]); Di2015NewLine        // here I'm assuming the children are in the list from left to right, Di2015NewLine        // such that children[0] is the leftmost child.Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

8044402Di2015UniqueSeparatorlet values = [ 1.0; 2.0; 1.5; 1.0; 4.0; 2.0 ]Di2015NewLine// Add indices as the first element of a tuple (so that we can identify positions)Di2015NewLinelet valuesIndexed = values |> Seq.mapi (fun i v -> i, v)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Use 'windowed' to create sliding window of size 3 and then 'choose'Di2015NewLine// indices where previous value and following value are both largerDi2015NewLinelet mins = Di2015NewLine  valuesIndexed |> Seq.windowed 3 |> Seq.choose (fun arr ->Di2015NewLine    match arr.[0], arr.[1], arr.[2] withDi2015NewLine    | (_, vpre), (i, v), (_, vpost) when vpre > v && vpost > v -> Some iDi2015NewLine    | _ -> None)Di2015NewLine

8044445Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Diagnostics;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq;Di2015NewLineusing System.Text;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace ConsoleApplication40 {Di2015NewLine  internal class Program {Di2015NewLine    private static List<BaseRegister> storage=new List<BaseRegister>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static void Main(string[] args) {Di2015NewLine      storage.Add(new BaseRegister {dirty=true});Di2015NewLine      storage.Add(new BaseRegister {dirty=false});Di2015NewLine      storage.Add(new BaseRegister {dirty=true});Di2015NewLine      Dump("---Before---");Di2015NewLine      storage.First(item => item.dirty==true).dirty=false;Di2015NewLine      Dump("---After---");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static void Dump(string title) {Di2015NewLine      Debug.WriteLine(title);Di2015NewLine      foreach(var br in storage) {Di2015NewLine        Debug.WriteLine(br.dirty);Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private class BaseRegister {Di2015NewLine      public bool dirty { set; get; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

bw.RunWorkerCompleted += new RunWorkerCompletedEventHandler(bw_RunWorkerCompleted);Di2015NewLine            bw.RunWorkerAsync();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        static void bw_RunWorkerCompleted(object sender, RunWorkerCompletedEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            bw.RunWorkerCompleted -= new RunWorkerCompletedEventHandler(bw_RunWorkerCompleted);Di2015NewLine            RefreshData();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        static void RefreshData()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int i, j;Di2015NewLine            dt = new DataTable("Table");Di2015NewLine            for (i = 0; i < NNInputs; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                dt.Columns.Add("Input " + i, typeof(double));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            dt.Columns.Add("Output", typeof(double));Di2015NewLine            for (i = 0; i < TRAINING_INPUT.GetLength(0); i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                DataRow dataRow = dt.NewRow();Di2015NewLine                for (j = 0; j < TRAINING_INPUT[i].GetLength(0); j++)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    //dataRow["Input " + j] = TRAINING_INPUT[i][j];Di2015NewLine                    dataRow["Input " + j] = ((((dataLow - dataHigh) * TRAINING_INPUT[i][j] - HighNormalize * dataLow + dataHigh * LowNormalize) / (LowNormalize - HighNormalize)));Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                //dataRow["Output"] = TRAINING_OUTPUT[i][0];Di2015NewLine                dataRow["Output"] = ((((dataLow - dataHigh) * TRAINING_OUTPUT[i][0] - HighNormalize * dataLow + dataHigh * LowNormalize) / (LowNormalize - HighNormalize)));Di2015NewLine                dt.Rows.Add(dataRow);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            gridview.DataSource = dt;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        static void PrepareData()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            double[] array_input = new double[NNInputs];Di2015NewLine            double[] array_output = new double[NNOutputs];Di2015NewLine            int i = 0;Di2015NewLine            int j = 0;Di2015NewLine            int refpoint = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //PREPARE DATA FOR NEURAL NETWORKDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            dataHigh = Math.Max(trainingData.Max(), neuralInput.Max());Di2015NewLine            dataLow = Math.Min(trainingData.Min(), neuralInput.Min());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            for (i = 0; i < trainingData.GetLength(0); i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                trainingData[i] = (((trainingData[i] - dataLow) / (dataHigh - dataLow)) * (HighNormalize - LowNormalize) + LowNormalize);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            NEURAL_INPUT = new double[neuralInput.GetLength(0)];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            for (i = 0; i < neuralInput.GetLength(0); i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                NEURAL_INPUT[i] = (((neuralInput[i] - dataLow) / (dataHigh - dataLow)) * (HighNormalize - LowNormalize) + LowNormalize);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            TRAINING_INPUT = new double[trainingSets][];Di2015NewLine            TRAINING_OUTPUT = new double[trainingSets][];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            for (i = 0; i < trainingSets; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                refpoint = (i * (NNInputs + NNOutputs));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                for (j = refpoint; j < refpoint + NNInputs; j++)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    array_input[j - refpoint] = trainingData[j];Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                refpoint = refpoint + NNInputs;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                for (j = refpoint; j < refpoint + NNOutputs; j++)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    if (trainingData.Length - 1 >= j)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        array_output[j - refpoint] = trainingData[j];Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                TRAINING_INPUT[i] = array_input;Di2015NewLine                TRAINING_OUTPUT[i] = array_output;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                array_input = new double[NNInputs];Di2015NewLine                array_output = new double[NNOutputs];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        static void ComputeNN()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            int i = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            BasicNetwork network = new BasicNetwork();Di2015NewLine            network.AddLayer(new BasicLayer(new ActivationTANH(), true, NNInputs));Di2015NewLine            network.AddLayer(new BasicLayer(new ActivationTANH(), true, hiddenLayerNeurons));Di2015NewLine            network.AddLayer(new BasicLayer(new ActivationTANH(), true, NNOutputs));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            network.Structure.FinalizeStructure();Di2015NewLine            network.Reset();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            IMLDataSet trainingSet = new BasicMLDataSet(TRAINING_INPUT, TRAINING_OUTPUT);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            ITrain train = new ResilientPropagation(network, trainingSet);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            int epoch = 1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            doDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                train.Iteration();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                epoch++;Di2015NewLine            } while ((epoch < epochMax));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            INeuralData input = new Encog.Neural.Data.Basic.BasicNeuralData(NNInputs);Di2015NewLine            for (i = 0; i < NNInputs; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                input[i] = NEURAL_INPUT[i];Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            IMLData output = network.Compute(input);Di2015NewLine            NeuralOutput = ((((dataLow - dataHigh) * output[0] - HighNormalize * dataLow + dataHigh * LowNormalize) / (LowNormalize - HighNormalize)));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        [DllExport("NNExportDLL", CallingConvention = CallingConvention.StdCall)]Di2015NewLine        static double NNExportDLL(Di2015NewLine            [MarshalAs(UnmanagedType.LPArray, SizeParamIndex = 1)] double[] training_data,Di2015NewLine            int training_data_size, int inputs, int outputs, int training_sets,Di2015NewLine            [MarshalAs(UnmanagedType.LPArray, SizeParamIndex = 2)] double[] neural_input,Di2015NewLine            int epoch_Max,Di2015NewLine            int hidden_Layer_Neurons,Di2015NewLine            double Low_Normalize,Di2015NewLine            double High_Normalize,Di2015NewLine            int ShowGUI)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //Define some global variablesDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            LowNormalize = new double();Di2015NewLine            HighNormalize = new double();Di2015NewLine            NNInputs = new int();Di2015NewLine            NNOutputs = new int();Di2015NewLine            trainingData = new double[training_data_size];Di2015NewLine            trainingDataSize = new int();Di2015NewLine            trainingSets = new int();Di2015NewLine            epochMax = new int();Di2015NewLine            hiddenLayerNeurons = new int();Di2015NewLine            neuralInput = new double[inputs];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            LowNormalize = Low_Normalize;Di2015NewLine            HighNormalize = High_Normalize;Di2015NewLine            NNInputs = inputs;Di2015NewLine            NNOutputs = outputs;Di2015NewLine            trainingData = training_data;Di2015NewLine            trainingDataSize = training_data_size;Di2015NewLine            trainingSets = training_sets;Di2015NewLine            epochMax = epoch_Max;Di2015NewLine            hiddenLayerNeurons = hidden_Layer_Neurons;Di2015NewLine            neuralInput = neural_input;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (ShowGUI == 1) { isShowGUI = true; } else { isShowGUI = false; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            PrepareData();Di2015NewLine            ComputeNN();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return (NeuralOutput);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Run();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // no more code here; it has been transferd to workMethod which runs in another threadDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void workMethod(object threadParam)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        OutputWindow outputwindow = (OutputWindow)threadParam;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // those are little ugly but you must go through dispatcher because you are now in a different thread than your outputwindowDi2015NewLine        outputwindow.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke((Action)(() => { outputwindow.textBox1.Text = "writing"; }), System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority.Normal);Di2015NewLine        //some more stuff doneDi2015NewLine        //some more stuff doneDi2015NewLine        //some more stuff doneDi2015NewLine        outputwindow.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke((Action)(() => { outputwindow.textBox1.Text = "\\nmore writing"; }), System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority.Normal);Di2015NewLine        //some more stuff doneDi2015NewLine        //some more stuff doneDi2015NewLine        //some more stuff doneDi2015NewLine        outputwindow.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke((Action)(() => { outputwindow.textBox1.Text = "\\nmore writing"; }), System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority.Normal);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // and finally close the outputWindowDi2015NewLine        outputwindow.Dispatcher.InvokeShutdown();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

8054395Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class WebDownloaderDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private static readonly ILog log = LogManager.GetLogger(typeof(WebDownloader));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public delegate void DownloadProgressDelegate(int percProgress);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static void Download(string uri, string localPath, DownloadProgressDelegate progressDelegate)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        long remoteSize;Di2015NewLine        string fullLocalPath; // Full local path including file name if only directory was provided.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        log.InfoFormat("Attempting to download file (Uri={0}, LocalPath={1})", uri, localPath);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            /// Get the name of the remote file.Di2015NewLine            Uri remoteUri = new Uri(uri);Di2015NewLine            string fileName = Path.GetFileName(remoteUri.LocalPath);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (Path.GetFileName(localPath).Length == 0)Di2015NewLine                fullLocalPath = Path.Combine(localPath, fileName);Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine                fullLocalPath = localPath;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            /// Have to get size of remote object through the webrequest as not available on remote files,Di2015NewLine            /// although it does work on local files.Di2015NewLine            using (WebResponse response = WebRequest.Create(uri).GetResponse())Di2015NewLine            using (Stream stream = response.GetResponseStream())Di2015NewLine                remoteSize = response.ContentLength;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            log.InfoFormat("Downloading file (Uri={0}, Size={1}, FullLocalPath={2}).",Di2015NewLine                uri, remoteSize, fullLocalPath);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new ApplicationException(string.Format("Error connecting to URI (Exception={0})", ex.Message), ex);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int bytesRead = 0, bytesReadTotal = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            using (WebClient client = new WebClient())Di2015NewLine            using (Stream streamRemote = client.OpenRead(new Uri(uri)))Di2015NewLine            using (Stream streamLocal = new FileStream(fullLocalPath, FileMode.Create, FileAccess.Write, FileShare.None))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                byte[] byteBuffer = new byte[1024 * 1024 * 2]; // 2 meg buffer although in testing only got to 10k max usage.Di2015NewLine                int perc = 0;Di2015NewLine                while ((bytesRead = streamRemote.Read(byteBuffer, 0, byteBuffer.Length)) > 0)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    bytesReadTotal += bytesRead;Di2015NewLine                    streamLocal.Write(byteBuffer, 0, bytesRead);Di2015NewLine                    int newPerc = (int)((double)bytesReadTotal / (double)remoteSize * 100);Di2015NewLine                    if (newPerc > perc)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        log.InfoFormat("...Downloading (BytesRead={0}, Perc={1})...", bytesReadTotal, perc);Di2015NewLine                        perc = newPerc;Di2015NewLine                        if (progressDelegate != null)Di2015NewLine                            progressDelegate(perc);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new ApplicationException(string.Format("Error downloading file (Exception={0})", ex.Message), ex);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        log.InfoFormat("File successfully downloaded (Uri={0}, BytesDownloaded={1}/{2}, FullLocalPath={3}).",Di2015NewLine            uri, bytesReadTotal, remoteSize, fullLocalPath);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

8056178Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class CompareCategory: IComparer<Category>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public int Compare(Category c1, Category c2)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var cat1 = new Version(c1.prefix);Di2015NewLine        var cat2 = new Version(c2.prefix);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (cat1 > cat2)Di2015NewLine            return 1;Di2015NewLine        else if (cat1 < cat2)Di2015NewLine            return -1;Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine            return 0;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
8056178Di2015UniqueSeparator    public class CategoryComparer : Comparer<Category>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public override int Compare(Category x, Category y)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var xParts = x.prefix.Split(new[] { '.' });Di2015NewLine            var yParts = y.prefix.Split(new[] { '.' });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            int index = 0;Di2015NewLine            while (true)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                bool xHasValue = xParts.Length > index;Di2015NewLine                bool yHasValue = yParts.Length > index;Di2015NewLine                if (xHasValue && !yHasValue)Di2015NewLine                    return 1;   // x biggerDi2015NewLine                if (!xHasValue && yHasValue)Di2015NewLine                    return -1;  // y biggerDi2015NewLine                if (!xHasValue && !yHasValue)Di2015NewLine                    return 0;   // no more values -- sameDi2015NewLine                var xValue = decimal.Parse("." + xParts[index]);Di2015NewLine                var yValue = decimal.Parse("." + yParts[index]);Di2015NewLine                if (xValue > yValue)Di2015NewLine                    return 1;   // x biggerDi2015NewLine                if (xValue < yValue)Di2015NewLine                    return -1;  // y biggerDi2015NewLine                index++;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public static void Main()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var categories = new List<Category>()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            new Category { prefix = "1" },Di2015NewLine            new Category { prefix = "2.2" },Di2015NewLine            new Category { prefix = "1.1.1" },Di2015NewLine            new Category { prefix = "1.1.1" },Di2015NewLine            new Category { prefix = "1.001.1" },Di2015NewLine            new Category { prefix = "3" },Di2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        categories.Sort(new CategoryComparer());Di2015NewLine        foreach (var category in categories)Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine(category.prefix);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

8056692Di2015UniqueSeparatorDi2015NewLine        public bool PasswordRequiresChanged(string userName)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            DirectoryEntry user = GetUser(userName); //A directory entry pointing to the userDi2015NewLine            Int64 pls;Di2015NewLine            int uac;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (user != null && user.Properties["pwdLastSet"] != null && user.Properties["pwdLastSet"].Value != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                pls = ConvertADSLargeIntegerToInt64(user.Properties["pwdLastSet"].Value);           Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                throw new Exception("Could not determine if password needs reset");Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (user != null && user.Properties["UserAccountControl"] != null && user.Properties["UserAccountControl"].Value != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                uac = (int)user.Properties["UserAccountControl"].Value;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                throw new Exception("Could not determine if password needs reset");Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return (pls == 0) && ((uac & 0x00010000) == 0) ? true : false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine
8056692Di2015UniqueSeparatorDi2015NewLine private static Int64 ConvertADSLargeIntegerToInt64(object adsLargeInteger)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var highPart = (Int32)adsLargeInteger.GetType().InvokeMember("HighPart", System.Reflection.BindingFlags.GetProperty, null, adsLargeInteger, null);Di2015NewLine            var lowPart = (Int32)adsLargeInteger.GetType().InvokeMember("LowPart", System.Reflection.BindingFlags.GetProperty, null, adsLargeInteger, null);Di2015NewLine            return highPart * ((Int64)UInt32.MaxValue + 1) + lowPart;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine

8058129Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class Permuter<T> : IEnumerable<IEnumerable<T>>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly IEnumerable<T> _sequence;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Permuter(IEnumerable<T> sequence)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _sequence = sequence;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public IEnumerator<IEnumerable<T>> GetEnumerator()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        foreach(var item in _sequence)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var remaining = _sequence.Except(Enumerable.Repeat(item, 1));Di2015NewLine            foreach (var permutation in new Permuter<T>(remaining))Di2015NewLine                yield return Enumerable.Repeat(item, 1).Concat(permutation);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    IEnumerator IEnumerable.GetEnumerator()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return GetEnumerator();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

8064353Di2015UniqueSeparatorvar data = new byte[4096];Di2015NewLinevar random = new Random();      Di2015NewLinevar queue = new Queue<byte>();Di2015NewLinevar stopWatch = new Stopwatch();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineTimeSpan dequeueTimespan, tryDequeueTimespan;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestopWatch.Restart();Di2015NewLinefor (int i = 0; i < 1000000; i++)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    random.NextBytes(data);Di2015NewLine    foreach (var item in data)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        queue.Enqueue(item);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    Dequeue(queue, 1024);Di2015NewLine    queue.Clear();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinestopWatch.Stop();Di2015NewLinedequeueTimespan = stopWatch.Elapsed;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestopWatch.Restart();Di2015NewLinefor (int i = 0; i < 1000000; i++)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    random.NextBytes(data);Di2015NewLine    foreach (var item in data)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        queue.Enqueue(item);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    TryDequeue(queue, 1024);Di2015NewLine    queue.Clear();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinestopWatch.Stop();Di2015NewLinetryDequeueTimespan = stopWatch.Elapsed;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineConsole.WriteLine("Dequeue:    {0}", dequeueTimespan);Di2015NewLineConsole.WriteLine("TryDequeue: {0}", tryDequeueTimespan);Di2015NewLineConsole.ReadKey();Di2015NewLine

8066167Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class Class1Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static IEnumerable<TResult> SelectAsync<TResult>(Di2015NewLine        IEnumerable<TResult> producer1,Di2015NewLine        IEnumerable<TResult> producer2,Di2015NewLine        int capacity)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var resultsQueue = new BlockingCollection<TResult>(capacity);Di2015NewLine        var producer1Done = false;Di2015NewLine        var producer2Done = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Task.Factory.StartNew(() =>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            foreach (var product in producer1)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                resultsQueue.Add(product);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            producer1Done = true;Di2015NewLine            if (producer1Done && producer2Done) { resultsQueue.CompleteAdding(); }Di2015NewLine        });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Task.Factory.StartNew(() =>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            foreach (var product in producer2)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                resultsQueue.Add(product);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            producer2Done = true;Di2015NewLine            if (producer1Done && producer2Done) { resultsQueue.CompleteAdding(); }Di2015NewLine        });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return resultsQueue.GetConsumingEnumerable();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static IEnumerable<TResult> SelectAsyncUnique<TResult>(this IEnumerable<TResult> source)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        HashSet<TResult> knownResults = new HashSet<TResult>();Di2015NewLine        foreach (TResult result in source)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (knownResults.Contains(result)) {continue;}Di2015NewLine            knownResults.Add(result);Di2015NewLine            yield return result;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

8067020Di2015UniqueSeparator internal static void UpdateCustomPropertyValue(DocX document, string customPropertyName, string customPropertyValue)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            foreach (XElement e in document.mainDoc.Descendants(XName.Get("instrText", w.NamespaceName))) Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                string attr_value = e.Value.Replace(" ", string.Empty).Trim();Di2015NewLine                string match_value = string.Format(@"DOCPROPERTY  {0}  \\* MERGEFORMAT", customPropertyName).Replace(" ", string.Empty);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (attr_value.Equals(match_value, StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    XNode node = e.Parent.NextNode;Di2015NewLine                    bool found = false;Di2015NewLine                    while (true)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        if (node.NodeType == XmlNodeType.Element)Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            var ele = node as XElement;Di2015NewLine                            var match = ele.Descendants(XName.Get("t", w.NamespaceName));Di2015NewLine                            if (match.Count() > 0)Di2015NewLine                            {Di2015NewLine                                if (!found)Di2015NewLine                                {Di2015NewLine                                    match.First().Value = customPropertyValue;Di2015NewLine                                    found = true;Di2015NewLine                                }Di2015NewLine                                elseDi2015NewLine                                {Di2015NewLine                                    ele.RemoveNodes();Di2015NewLine                                }Di2015NewLine                            }Di2015NewLine                            elseDi2015NewLine                            {Di2015NewLine                                match = ele.Descendants(XName.Get("fldChar", w.NamespaceName));Di2015NewLine                                if (match.Count() > 0)Di2015NewLine                                {Di2015NewLine                                    var endMatch = match.First().Attribute(XName.Get("fldCharType", w.NamespaceName));Di2015NewLine                                    if (endMatch != null && endMatch.Value == "end")Di2015NewLine                                    {Di2015NewLine                                        break;Di2015NewLine                                    }Di2015NewLine                                }Di2015NewLine                            }Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                        node = node.NextNode;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            foreach (XElement e in document.mainDoc.Descendants(XName.Get("fldSimple", w.NamespaceName))) Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                string attr_value = e.Attribute(XName.Get("instr", w.NamespaceName)).Value.Replace(" ", string.Empty).Trim();Di2015NewLine                string match_value = string.Format(@"DOCPROPERTY  {0}  \\* MERGEFORMAT", customPropertyName).Replace(" ", string.Empty);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (attr_value.Equals(match_value, StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine "rPr");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    // Delete everything and insert updated text valueDi2015NewLine                    e.RemoveNodes();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    XElement t = new XElement(w + "t", rPr, customPropertyValue);Di2015NewLine                    Novacode.Text.PreserveSpace(t);Di2015NewLine                    e.Add(new XElement(firstRun.Name, firstRun.Attributes(), firstRun.Element(XName.Get("rPr", w.NamespaceName)), t));Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
8067046Di2015UniqueSeparatorDoDragDrop
8067046Di2015UniqueSeparatorMouseOver
8067046Di2015UniqueSeparator    private void listBox_MouseDown(object sender, System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs e) Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Get the index of the item the mouse is below.Di2015NewLine        indexOfItemUnderMouseToDrag = listBox.IndexFromPoint(e.X, e.Y);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (indexOfItemUnderMouseToDrag != ListBox.NoMatches) {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Remember the point where the mouse down occurred. The DragSize indicatesDi2015NewLine            // the size that the mouse can move before a drag event should be started.                Di2015NewLine            Size dragSize = SystemInformation.DragSize;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Create a rectangle using the DragSize, with the mouse position beingDi2015NewLine            // at the center of the rectangle.Di2015NewLine            dragBoxFromMouseDown = new Rectangle(new Point(e.X - (dragSize.Width /2),Di2015NewLine                                                           e.Y - (dragSize.Height /2)), dragSize);Di2015NewLine        } elseDi2015NewLine            // Reset the rectangle if the mouse is not over an item in the ListBox.Di2015NewLine            dragBoxFromMouseDown = Rectangle.Empty;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void listBox_MouseUp(object sender, System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs e) {Di2015NewLine        // Reset the drag rectangle when the mouse button is raised.Di2015NewLine        dragBoxFromMouseDown = Rectangle.Empty;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void listBox_MouseMove(object sender, System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs e) Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if ((e.Button & MouseButtons.Left) == MouseButtons.Left) {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // If the mouse moves outside the rectangle, start the drag.Di2015NewLine            if (dragBoxFromMouseDown != Rectangle.Empty && Di2015NewLine                !dragBoxFromMouseDown.Contains(e.X, e.Y)) Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                    DragDropEffects dropEffect = listBox.DoDragDrop(listBox.Items[indexOfItemUnderMouseToDrag], DragDropEffects.All | DragDropEffects.Link);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    // If the drag operation was a move then remove the item.Di2015NewLine                    if (dropEffect == DragDropEffects.Move) {                        Di2015NewLine                        listBox.Items.RemoveAt(indexOfItemUnderMouseToDrag);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        // Selects the previous item in the list as long as the list has an item.Di2015NewLine                        if (indexOfItemUnderMouseToDrag > 0)Di2015NewLine                            listBox.SelectedIndex = indexOfItemUnderMouseToDrag -1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        else if (ListDragSource.Items.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine                            // Selects the first item.Di2015NewLine                            listBox.SelectedIndex =0;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

8070150Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class MyClassDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static MyClass operator &(MyClass left, MyClass right)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return new MyClass();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static MyClass operator |(MyClass left, MyClass right)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return new MyClass();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static MyClass operator ^(MyClass left, MyClass right)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return new MyClass();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevar a = new MyClass();Di2015NewLinevar b = new MyClass();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevar c = a & b;Di2015NewLinevar d = a | b;Di2015NewLinevar e = a ^ b;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinea &= b; // a = a & b;Di2015NewLinec |= d; // c = c & d;Di2015NewLinee ^= e; // e = e ^ e;Di2015NewLine

8073543Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic sealed class RoleValidationDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private Dictionary<System.Type, List<IAction>> roleMap_ = new Dictionary<System.Type, List<IAction>>(); // this is our mapping of roles to actionsDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // ctor ignored for brevityDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void AssignActionToRole<ROLE>(IAction action)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Debug.Assert(action != null);Di2015NewLine        if(roleMap_.ContainsKey(typeof(ROLE)))Di2015NewLine            roleMap_[typeof(ROLE)].Add(action);Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            List<IAction> actions = new List<IAction>();Di2015NewLine            actions.Add(action);Di2015NewLine            roleMap_[typeof(ROLE)] = actions;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Nice generic function for ease of useDi2015NewLine    public List<IAction> GetActions<ROLE>() where ROLE : IRoleDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        foreach(KeyValuePair<System.Type, IAction> pair in roleMap_)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if(typeof(ROLE).IsAssignableFrom(pair.Key.GetType()))Di2015NewLine                return pair.Value;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return null;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // for everyone else, non-explicitDi2015NewLine    public List<IAction> GetActions(System.Type type)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        foreach(KeyValuePair<System.Type, IAction> pair in roleMap_)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if(type.IsAssignableFrom(pair.Key.GetType()))Di2015NewLine                return pair.Value;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return null;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine} // eo class RoleValidationDi2015NewLine

8074703Di2015UniqueSeparatornamespace RTreeDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineopen SystemDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinemodule Envelope =Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  type t = float * float * float * floatDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  let ranges_intersect a b a' b' = a' <= b && a <= b'Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  let intersects (x0, x1, y0, y1) (x0', x1', y0', y1') =Di2015NewLine    (* For two envelopes to intersect, both of their ranges do. *)Di2015NewLine    ranges_intersect x0 x1 x0' x1' && ranges_intersect y0 y1 y0' y1'Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  let add (x0, x1, y0, y1) (x0', x1', y0', y1') =Di2015NewLine    min x0 x0', max x1 x1', min y0 y0', max y1 y1'Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  let rec add_many = functionDi2015NewLine    | e :: [] -> eDi2015NewLine    | e :: es -> add e (add_many es)Di2015NewLine    | [] -> raise (ArgumentException "can't zero envelopes")Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  let area (x0, x1, y0, y1) =Di2015NewLine    (x1 - x0) * (y1 - y0)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  let within (x0, x1, y0, y1) (x0', x1', y0', y1') =Di2015NewLine    x0 <= x0' && x1 >= x1' && y0 <= y0' && y1 >= y1'Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  let empty = 0., 0., 0., 0.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinemodule rtree =Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  type 'a t =Di2015NewLine      Node of (Envelope.t * 'a t) listDi2015NewLine    | Leaf of (Envelope.t * 'a) listDi2015NewLine    | EmptyDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  let max_node_load = 8Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  let empty = EmptyDi2015NewLine  let empty_node = (Envelope.empty, Empty)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  let enlargement_needed e e' =Di2015NewLine    Envelope.area (Envelope.add e e') - Envelope.area eDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  let rec partition_by_min_enlargement e = functionDi2015NewLine    | (e', _) as n :: [] ->Di2015NewLine        n, [], enlargement_needed e e'Di2015NewLine    | (e', _) as n :: ns ->Di2015NewLine        let enlargement = enlargement_needed e e' Di2015NewLine        let min, maxs, enlargement' = partition_by_min_enlargement e ns Di2015NewLine        if enlargement < enlargement' thenDi2015NewLine          n, min :: maxs, enlargementDi2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine          min, n :: maxs, enlargement'Di2015NewLine    | [] ->Di2015NewLine        raise (ArgumentException "cannot partition an empty node")Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  let pairs_of_list xs =  (* (cross product) *)Di2015NewLine    List.concat (List.map (fun x -> List.map (fun y -> (x, y)) xs) xs)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  (* This is Guttman's quadradic splitting algorithm. *)Di2015NewLine  let split_pick_seeds ns =Di2015NewLine    let pairs = pairs_of_list ns Di2015NewLine    let cost (e0, _) (e1, _) =Di2015NewLine      (Envelope.area (Envelope.add e0 e1)) -Di2015NewLine      (Envelope.area e0) - (Envelope.area e1) Di2015NewLine    let rec max_cost = functionDi2015NewLine      | (n, n') :: [] -> cost n n', (n, n')Di2015NewLine      | (n, n') as pair :: ns ->Di2015NewLine          let max_cost', pair' = max_cost ns Di2015NewLine          let cost = cost n n' Di2015NewLine          if cost > max_cost' thenDi2015NewLine            cost, pairDi2015NewLine          elseDi2015NewLine            max_cost', pair'Di2015NewLine      | [] -> raise (ArgumentException "can't compute split on empty list") Di2015NewLine    let (_, groups) = max_cost pairs in groupsDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  let split_pick_next e0 e1 ns =Di2015NewLine    let diff (e, _) =Di2015NewLine      abs ((enlargement_needed e0 e) - (enlargement_needed e1 e)) Di2015NewLine    let rec max_difference = functionDi2015NewLine      | n :: [] -> diff n, nDi2015NewLine      | n :: ns ->Di2015NewLine          let diff', n' = max_difference ns Di2015NewLine          let diff = diff n Di2015NewLine          if diff > diff' thenDi2015NewLine            diff, nDi2015NewLine          elseDi2015NewLine            diff', n'Di2015NewLine      | [] -> raise (ArgumentException "can't compute max diff on empty list") Di2015NewLine    let (_, n) = max_difference ns in nDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  let split_nodes ns =Di2015NewLine    let rec partition xs xs_envelope ys ys_envelope = functionDi2015NewLine      | [] -> (xs, xs_envelope), (ys, ys_envelope)Di2015NewLine      | rest -> Di2015NewLine          let (e, _) as n = split_pick_next xs_envelope ys_envelope rest Di2015NewLine          let rest' = List.filter ((<>) n) rest Di2015NewLine          let enlargement_x = enlargement_needed e xs_envelope Di2015NewLine          let enlargement_y = enlargement_needed e ys_envelope Di2015NewLine          if enlargement_x < enlargement_y thenDi2015NewLine            partition (n :: xs) (Envelope.add xs_envelope e) ys ys_envelope rest'Di2015NewLine          elseDi2015NewLine            partition xs xs_envelope (n :: ys) (Envelope.add ys_envelope e) rest'Di2015NewLine    let (((e0, _) as n0), ((e1, _) as n1)) = split_pick_seeds ns Di2015NewLine    partition [n0] e0 [n1] e1 (List.filter (fun n -> n <> n0 && n <> n1) ns)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  let envelope_of_nodes ns = Envelope.add_many (List.map (fun (e, _) -> e) ns)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  let rec insert' elem e = functionDi2015NewLine    | Node ns -> Di2015NewLine        let (_, min), maxs, _ = partition_by_min_enlargement e ns Di2015NewLine        match insert' elem e min withDi2015NewLine          | min', (_, Empty) ->Di2015NewLine              let ns' = min' :: maxs Di2015NewLine              let e' = envelope_of_nodes ns' Di2015NewLine              (e', Node ns'), empty_nodeDi2015NewLine          | min', min'' when (List.length maxs + 2) < max_node_load ->Di2015NewLine              let ns' = min' :: min'' :: maxs Di2015NewLine              let e' = envelope_of_nodes ns' Di2015NewLine              (e', Node ns'), empty_nodeDi2015NewLine          | min', min'' ->Di2015NewLine              let (a, envelope_a), (b, envelope_b) =Di2015NewLine                split_nodes (min' :: min'' :: maxs) Di2015NewLine              (envelope_a, Node a), (envelope_b, Node b)Di2015NewLine    | Leaf es ->Di2015NewLine        let es' = (e, elem) :: es Di2015NewLine        if List.length es' > max_node_load thenDi2015NewLine          let (a, envelope_a), (b, envelope_b) = split_nodes es' Di2015NewLine          (envelope_a, Leaf a), (envelope_b, Leaf b)Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine          (envelope_of_nodes es', Leaf es'), empty_nodeDi2015NewLine    | Empty ->Di2015NewLine        (e, Leaf [e, elem]), empty_nodeDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  let insert t elem e =Di2015NewLine    match insert' elem e t withDi2015NewLine      | (_, a), (_, Empty) -> aDi2015NewLine      | a, b -> Node [a; b]  (* root split *)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  let filter_intersecting e =Di2015NewLine    List.filter (fun (e', _) -> Envelope.intersects e e')Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  let rec find t e =Di2015NewLine    match t withDi2015NewLine      | Node ns ->Di2015NewLine          let intersecting = filter_intersecting e ns Di2015NewLine          let found = List.map (fun (_, n) -> find n e) intersecting Di2015NewLine          List.concat foundDi2015NewLine      | Leaf es -> List.map snd (filter_intersecting e es)Di2015NewLine      | Empty -> []Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  let rec size = functionDi2015NewLine    | Node ns ->Di2015NewLine        let sub_sizes = List.map (fun (_, n) -> size n) ns Di2015NewLine        List.fold (+) 0 sub_sizesDi2015NewLine    | Leaf es ->Di2015NewLine        List.length esDi2015NewLine    | Empty ->Di2015NewLine        0Di2015NewLine

(textBox.SelectionStart + textBox.SelectionLength))Di2015NewLine                    );Di2015NewLine            e.Handled = true;Di2015NewLine            textBox.SelectionStart = selectionStart + Tab.Length;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    } Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Called when the behavior is being detached from its AssociatedObject, but before it has actually occurred.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <remarks>Di2015NewLine    /// Override this to unhook functionality from the AssociatedObject.Di2015NewLine    /// </remarks>Di2015NewLine    protected override void OnDetaching()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        base.OnDetaching();Di2015NewLine        this.AssociatedObject.KeyDown -= textBox_KeyDown;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

8079856Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic IList<int> GetNodePathIndexes(TreeNode node)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    List<int> indexes = new List<int>();Di2015NewLine    TreeNode currentNode = node;Di2015NewLine    while (currentNode != null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        TreeNode parentNode = currentNode.Parent;Di2015NewLine        if (parentNode != null)Di2015NewLine            indexes.Add(parentNode.Nodes.IndexOf(currentNode));Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine            indexes.Add(currentNode.TreeView.Nodes.IndexOf(currentNode));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        currentNode = parentNode;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    indexes.Reverse();Di2015NewLine    return indexes;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

public static IEnumerable<TResult> RankByDescending<TSource, TKey, TResult>(Di2015NewLine        this IEnumerable<TSource> source,Di2015NewLine        Func<TSource, TKey> keySelector,Di2015NewLine        Func<TSource, int, TResult> resultSelector)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return source.RankBy(keySelector, null, true, resultSelector);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine IComparer<TKey> comparer,Di2015NewLine        bool descending,Di2015NewLine        Func<TSource, int, TResult> resultSelector)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        comparer = comparer ?? 8084905Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System.Windows;Di2015NewLineusing System.Windows.Media;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace MyNamespaceDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public class VisualTreeHelpersDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Looks for a child control within a parent by nameDi2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        public static T FindChild<T>(DependencyObject parent, string childName)Di2015NewLine        where T : DependencyObjectDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Confirm parent and childName are valid.Di2015NewLine            if (parent == null) return null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            T foundChild = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            int childrenCount = VisualTreeHelper.GetChildrenCount(parent);Di2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < childrenCount; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var child = VisualTreeHelper.GetChild(parent, i);Di2015NewLine                // If the child is not of the request child type childDi2015NewLine                T childType = child as T;Di2015NewLine                if (childType == null)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    // recursively drill down the treeDi2015NewLine                    foundChild = FindChild<T>(child, childName);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    // If the child is found, break so we do not overwrite the found child.Di2015NewLine                    if (foundChild != null) break;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                else if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(childName))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    var frameworkElement = child as FrameworkElement;Di2015NewLine                    // If the child's name is set for searchDi2015NewLine                    if (frameworkElement != null && frameworkElement.Name == childName)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        // if the child's name is of the request nameDi2015NewLine                        foundChild = (T)child;Di2015NewLine                        break;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    elseDi2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        // recursively drill down the treeDi2015NewLine                        foundChild = FindChild<T>(child, childName);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        // If the child is found, break so we do not overwrite the found child.Di2015NewLine                        if (foundChild != null) break;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    // child element found.Di2015NewLine                    foundChild = (T)child;Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return foundChild;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

8085794Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq;Di2015NewLineusing System.Net;Di2015NewLineusing System.Net.Sockets;Di2015NewLineusing System.Text;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace SocketServerDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    class ConnectionDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public Socket Socket { get; private set; }Di2015NewLine        public byte[] Buffer { get; private set; }Di2015NewLine        public Encoding Encoding { get; private set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public Connection(Socket socket)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            this.Socket = socket;Di2015NewLine            this.Buffer = new byte[2048];Di2015NewLine            this.Encoding = Encoding.UTF8;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public void WaitForNextString(AsyncCallback callback)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            this.Socket.BeginReceive(this.Buffer, 0, 4, SocketFlags.None, callback, this);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    class ProgramDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Connection connection;Di2015NewLine            using (Socket listener = new Socket(AddressFamily.InterNetwork, SocketType.Stream, ProtocolType.Tcp))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                listener.Bind(new IPEndPoint(IPAddress.Loopback, 6767));Di2015NewLine                listener.Listen(1);Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine("Listening for a connection.  Press any key to end the session.");Di2015NewLine                connection = new Connection(listener.Accept());Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine("Connection established.");Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            connection.WaitForNextString(ReceivedString);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Console.ReadKey();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        static void ReceivedString(IAsyncResult asyncResult)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Connection connection = (Connection)asyncResult.AsyncState;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            int bytesReceived = connection.Socket.EndReceive(asyncResult);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (bytesReceived > 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                int length = BitConverter.ToInt32(connection.Buffer, 0);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                byte[] buffer;Di2015NewLine                if (length > connection.Buffer.Length)Di2015NewLine                    buffer = new byte[length];Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                    buffer = connection.Buffer;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                int index = 0;Di2015NewLine                int remainingLength = length;Di2015NewLine                doDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    bytesReceived = connection.Socket.Receive(buffer, index, remainingLength, SocketFlags.None);Di2015NewLine                    index += bytesReceived;Di2015NewLine                    remainingLength -= bytesReceived;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                while (bytesReceived > 0 && remainingLength > 0);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (remainingLength > 0)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    Console.WriteLine("Connection was closed before entire string could be received");Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    Console.WriteLine(connection.Encoding.GetString(buffer, 0, length));Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                connection.WaitForNextString(ReceivedString);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
8085794Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq;Di2015NewLineusing System.Net;Di2015NewLineusing System.Net.Sockets;Di2015NewLineusing System.Text;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace SocketClientDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    class ProgramDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var encoding = Encoding.UTF8;Di2015NewLine            using (var connector = new Socket(AddressFamily.InterNetwork, SocketType.Stream, ProtocolType.Tcp))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                connector.Connect(new IPEndPoint(IPAddress.Loopback, 6767));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                string value;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                value = "1234";Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine("Press any key to send \\"" + value + "\\".");Di2015NewLine any key to send \\"" + value + "\\".");Di2015NewLine                Console.ReadKey();Di2015NewLine                SendString(connector, encoding, value);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                value = "A1B2C3D4E5F6";Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine("Press any key to send \\"" + value + "\\".");Di2015NewLine                Console.ReadKey();Di2015NewLine                SendString(connector, encoding, value);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine("Press any key to exit.");Di2015NewLine                Console.ReadKey();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                connector.Close();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        static void SendString(Socket socket, Encoding encoding, string value)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            socket.Send(BitConverter.GetBytes(encoding.GetByteCount(value)));Di2015NewLine            socket.Send(encoding.GetBytes(value));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

8087164Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static byte[] ReadMessage(SslStream sslStream)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    byte[] buffer = new byte[2048];Di2015NewLine    MemoryStream stream = new MemoryStream();Di2015NewLine    int bytes = -1;Di2015NewLine    while (bytes != 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        bytes = sslStream.Read(buffer, 0, buffer.Length);Di2015NewLine        // Use "bytes" instead of "buffer.Length" hereDi2015NewLine        stream.Write(buffer, 0, bytes);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return stream.ToArray();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

8087360Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static void Main()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //Make an array of the possible sentence enders. Doing this pattern lets us easily updateDi2015NewLine        // the code later if it becomes necessary, or allows us easily to move this to an inputDi2015NewLine        // parameterDi2015NewLine        string[] SentenceEnders = new string[] {"$", @"\\.", @"\\?", @"\\!" /* Add Any Others */};Di2015NewLine        string WhatToFind = "a"; //What are we looking for? Regular Expressions Will Work Too!!!Di2015NewLine        string SentenceToCheck = "This, but not to exclude any others, is a sample."; //First exampleDi2015NewLine        string MultipleSentencesToCheck = @"Di2015NewLine        Is this a sentenceDi2015NewLine        that breaks upDi2015NewLine        among multiple lines?Di2015NewLine        Yes!Di2015NewLine        It also hasDi2015NewLine        more than oneDi2015NewLine        sentence.Di2015NewLine        "; //Second ExampleDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //This will split the input on all the enders put together(by way of joining them in [] inside a regularDi2015NewLine        // expression.Di2015NewLine        string[] SplitSentences = Regex.Split(SentenceToCheck, "[" + String.Join("", SentenceEnders) + "]", RegexOptions.IgnoreCase);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //SplitSentences is an array, with sentences on each index. The first index is the first sentenceDi2015NewLine        string FirstSentence = SplitSentences[0];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Now, split that single sentence on our matching pattern for what we should be countingDi2015NewLine        string[] SubSplitSentence = Regex.Split(FirstSentence, WhatToFind, RegexOptions.IgnoreCase);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Now that it's split, it's split a number of times that matches how many matches we found, plus oneDi2015NewLine        // (The "Left over" is the +1Di2015NewLine        int HowMany = SubSplitSentence.Length - 1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        System.Console.WriteLine(string.Format("We found, in the first sentence, {0} '{1}'.", HowMany, WhatToFind));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Do all this again for the second example. Note that ideally, this would be in a separate functionDi2015NewLine        // and you wouldn't be writing code twice, but I wanted you to see it without all the comments so you canDi2015NewLine        // compare and contrastDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        SplitSentences = Regex.Split(MultipleSentencesToCheck, "[" + String.Join("", SentenceEnders) + "]", RegexOptions.IgnoreCase | RegexOptions.Singleline);Di2015NewLine        SubSplitSentence = Regex.Split(SplitSentences[0], WhatToFind, RegexOptions.IgnoreCase | RegexOptions.Singleline);Di2015NewLine        HowMany = SubSplitSentence.Length - 1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        System.Console.WriteLine(string.Format("We found, in the second sentence, {0} '{1}'.", HowMany, WhatToFind));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
8087360Di2015UniqueSeparatorWe found, in the first sentence, 3 'a'.Di2015NewLineWe found, in the second sentence, 4 'a'.Di2015NewLine

8092237Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate string asmBase;Di2015NewLinepublic Type[] GetAllTypeinAssembly(string assemblyName)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    asmBase = System.IO.Path.GetDirectoryName(assemblyName);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    AppDomain.CurrentDomain.AssemblyResolve += new ResolveEventHandler(CurrentDomain_AssemblyResolve);Di2015NewLine    System.Reflection.Assembly asm = System.Reflection.Assembly.Load(System.IO.File.ReadAllBytes(assemblyName));//domain.Load(bt) ;// Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return asm.GetTypes();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate Assembly CurrentDomain_AssemblyResolve(object sender, ResolveEventArgs args)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    //This handler is called only when the common language runtime tries to bind to the assembly and fails.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //Retrieve the list of referenced assemblies in an array of AssemblyName.Di2015NewLine    Assembly MyAssembly, objExecutingAssemblies;Di2015NewLine    string strTempAssmbPath = "";Di2015NewLine    objExecutingAssemblies = args.RequestingAssembly;Di2015NewLine    AssemblyName[] arrReferencedAssmbNames = objExecutingAssemblies.GetReferencedAssemblies();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //Loop through the array of referenced assembly names.Di2015NewLine    foreach (AssemblyName strAssmbName in arrReferencedAssmbNames)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //Check for the assembly names that have raised the "AssemblyResolve" event.Di2015NewLine        if (strAssmbName.FullName.Substring(0, strAssmbName.FullName.IndexOf(",")) == args.Name.Substring(0, args.Name.IndexOf(",")))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //Build the path of the assembly from where it has to be loaded.                Di2015NewLine            strTempAssmbPath = asmBase + "\\\\" + args.Name.Substring(0, args.Name.IndexOf(",")) + ".dll";Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    //Load the assembly from the specified path.                    Di2015NewLine    MyAssembly = Assembly.LoadFrom(strTempAssmbPath);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //Return the loaded assembly.Di2015NewLine    return MyAssembly;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

8096032Di2015UniqueSeparatorProcessObject()
8096032Di2015UniqueSeparatorList<ObjectWalkerEntity>
8096032Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class ObjectWalkerEntityDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine   public object Value { get; set; }Di2015NewLine   public PropertyInfo PropertyInfo { get; set; }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static class ObjectWalkerDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine   public static List<ObjectWalkerEntity> Walk(object o)Di2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine      return ProcessObject(o).ToList();Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   private static IEnumerable<ObjectWalkerEntity> ProcessObject(object o)Di2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine      if (o == null)Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine         // nothing here, just return an empty enumerable objectDi2015NewLine         return new ObjectWalkerEntity[0];Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      // create the list to hold values found in this objectDi2015NewLine      var objectList = new List<ObjectWalkerEntity>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      Type t = o.GetType();Di2015NewLine      foreach (PropertyInfo pi in t.GetProperties())Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine         if (IsGeneric(pi.PropertyType))Di2015NewLine         {Di2015NewLine            // Add generic objectDi2015NewLine            var obj = new ObjectWalkerEntity();Di2015NewLine            obj.PropertyInfo = pi;Di2015NewLine            obj.Value = pi.GetValue(o, null);Di2015NewLine            objectList.Add(obj);Di2015NewLine         }Di2015NewLine         elseDi2015NewLine         {Di2015NewLine            // not generic, get the property value and make the recursive callDi2015NewLine            object value = pi.GetValue(o, null);Di2015NewLine            // all values returned from the recursive call get Di2015NewLine            // rolled up into the list created in this call.Di2015NewLine            objectList.AddRange(ProcessObject(value));Di2015NewLine         }Di2015NewLine      } Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      return objectList.AsReadOnly();Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   private static bool IsGeneric(Type type)Di2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine      returnDi2015NewLine          IsSubclassOfRawGeneric(type, typeof(bool)) ||Di2015NewLine          IsSubclassOfRawGeneric(type, typeof(string)) ||Di2015NewLine          IsSubclassOfRawGeneric(type, typeof(int)) ||Di2015NewLine          IsSubclassOfRawGeneric(type, typeof(UInt16)) ||Di2015NewLine          IsSubclassOfRawGeneric(type, typeof(UInt32)) ||Di2015NewLine          IsSubclassOfRawGeneric(type, typeof(UInt64)) ||Di2015NewLine          IsSubclassOfRawGeneric(type, typeof(DateTime));Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   private static bool IsSubclassOfRawGeneric(Type generic, Type toCheck)Di2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine      while (toCheck != typeof(object))Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine         var cur = toCheck.IsGenericType ? toCheck.GetGenericTypeDefinition() : toCheck;Di2015NewLine         if (generic == cur)Di2015NewLine         {Di2015NewLine            return true;Di2015NewLine         }Di2015NewLine         toCheck = toCheck.BaseType;Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine      return false;Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

8097706Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class AppendTextFilter : StreamDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private Stream Filter { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    private string Text { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    private bool TextWritten { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public AppendTextFilter( Stream filter, string text )Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.Filter = filter;Di2015NewLine        this.Text = text;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override bool CanRead { get { return Filter.CanRead; } }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override bool CanSeek { get { return Filter.CanSeek; } }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override bool CanWrite { get { return Filter.CanWrite; } }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override void Flush()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (!TextWritten)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var bytes = Encoding.UTF7.GetBytes( Text );Di2015NewLine            Filter.Write( bytes, 0, bytes.Length );Di2015NewLine            TextWritten = true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        Filter.Flush();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override long Length { get { return Filter.Length + Text.Length; } }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override long PositionDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        getDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return Filter.Position;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        setDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Filter.Position = value;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override int Read( byte[] buffer, int offset, int count )Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return Filter.Read( buffer, offset, count );Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override long Seek( long offset, SeekOrigin origin )Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return Filter.Seek( offset, origin );Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override void SetLength( long value )Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Filter.SetLength( value );Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override void Write( byte[] buffer, int offset, int count )Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Filter.Write( buffer, offset, count );Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

8098652Di2015UniqueSeparatorint abs (int a) Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int b = a;Di2015NewLine    b = (b >> (sizeof(int)*CHAR_BIT-1) & 1);Di2015NewLine    return 2 * b * (a) + a; Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineint max (int a, int b) { return (a + b + abs(a - b)) / 2; }Di2015NewLineint min (int a, int b) { return (a + b - abs(a - b)) / 2; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevoid sort (int & a, int & b, int & c)Di2015NewLine{       Di2015NewLine   int maxnum = max(max(a,b), c);Di2015NewLine   int minnum = min(min(a,b), c);Di2015NewLine   int middlenum = a + b + c - maxnum - minnum;Di2015NewLine   a = maxnum;Di2015NewLine   b = middlenum;Di2015NewLine   c = minnum;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

8099976Di2015UniqueSeparatorstruct WonkyNumberDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private const double SCALE_FACTOR    = 1.0E+8          ;Di2015NewLine    private int          _intValue        ;Di2015NewLine    private int          _fractionalValue ;Di2015NewLine    private double       _doubleValue     ;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public int    IntegralValueDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        getDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return _intValue ;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        setDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            _intValue = value ;Di2015NewLine            _doubleValue = ComputeDouble() ;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public int    FractionalValueDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        getDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return _fractionalValue ;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        setDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            _fractionalValue = value ;Di2015NewLine            _doubleValue     = ComputeDouble() ;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public double DoubleValueDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        getDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return _doubleValue ;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        setDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            this.DoubleValue = value ;Di2015NewLine            ParseDouble( out _intValue , out _fractionalValue ) ;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public WonkyNumber( double value ) : this()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _doubleValue = value ;Di2015NewLine        ParseDouble( out _intValue , out _fractionalValue ) ;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public WonkyNumber( int x , int y ) : this()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        _intValue        = x ;Di2015NewLine        _fractionalValue = y ;Di2015NewLine        _doubleValue     = ComputeDouble() ;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return ;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void ParseDouble( out int x , out int y )Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        double remainder = _doubleValue % 1.0 ;Di2015NewLine        double quotient  = _doubleValue - remainder ;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        x = (int)   quotient                   ;Di2015NewLine        y = (int) Math.Round( remainder * SCALE_FACTOR ) ;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return ;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private double ComputeDouble()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        double value =     (double) this.IntegralValueDi2015NewLine                     + ( ( (double) this.FractionalValue ) / SCALE_FACTOR )Di2015NewLine                     ;Di2015NewLine        return value ;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static implicit operator WonkyNumber( double value )Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        WonkyNumber instance = new WonkyNumber( value ) ;Di2015NewLine        return instance ;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static implicit operator double( WonkyNumber value )Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        double instance = value.DoubleValue ;Di2015NewLine        return instance ;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

8100473Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static void RetrieveForeignKeyInfo(OleDbConnection cnn, TableSchema tableSchema, Func<string, string> prepareColumnNameForMapping)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    string[] fkRestrictions = new string[] { null, null, null, null, null, tableSchema.TableName };Di2015NewLine    using (DataTable dtForeignKeys = cnn.GetOleDbSchemaTable(OleDbSchemaGuid.Foreign_Keys, fkRestrictions)) {Di2015NewLine        ForeignKey foreignKey = null;Di2015NewLine        string constraintName = "";Di2015NewLine        foreach (DataRow row in dtForeignKeys.Rows) {Di2015NewLine            string newConstraintName = (string)row["FK_NAME"];Di2015NewLine            if (newConstraintName != constraintName) {Di2015NewLine                constraintName = newConstraintName;Di2015NewLine                foreignKey = new ForeignKey();Di2015NewLine                foreignKey.MasterTableName = (string)row["PK_TABLE_NAME"];Di2015NewLine                tableSchema.ForeignKeys.Add(foreignKey);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            var foreignKeyColumn = new ForeignKeyColumn();Di2015NewLine            foreignKeyColumn.DetailColumnName = (string)row["FK_COLUMN_NAME"];Di2015NewLine            foreignKeyColumn.MasterColumnName = (string)row["PK_COLUMN_NAME"];Di2015NewLine            foreignKeyColumn.DetailColumnNameForMapping = prepareColumnNameForMapping(foreignKeyColumn.DetailColumnName);Di2015NewLine            foreignKeyColumn.MasterColumnNameForMapping = prepareColumnNameForMapping(foreignKeyColumn.MasterColumnName);Di2015NewLine            foreignKey.Columns.Add(foreignKeyColumn);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

8100555Di2015UniqueSeparator    public static readonly DependencyProperty InteractionsProviderProperty = Di2015NewLine        DependencyProperty.Register("InteractionsProvider", typeof(IInteractionsProvider), typeof(IdattInteractions), new PropertyMetadata(null, OnInteractionsProviderPropertyChanged)); Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static void OnInteractionsProviderPropertyChanged(DependencyObject d, DependencyPropertyChangedEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine         var source = d As MyInteractions;Di2015NewLine         if (source ! = null)Di2015NewLine         {Di2015NewLine             var oldValue = (IInteractionsProvider)e.OldValue;Di2015NewLine             var newValue = (IInteractionsProvider)e.NewValue;Di2015NewLine             source.OnInteractionsProviderPropertyChanged(oldValue, newValue);Di2015NewLine         }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    private void OnInteractionsProviderPropertyChanged(IInteractionsProvider oldValue, IInteractionsProvider newValue)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine         if (oldValue != null)Di2015NewLine              oldValue -= InteractionsProvider_InteractionRequested;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine         if (newValue != null)Di2015NewLine              newValue += InteractionsProvider_InteractionRequested;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    private void InteractionsProvider_InteractionRequested(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Do StuffDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
8100691Di2015UniqueSeparatoryield
8100691Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic IEnumerable<Range> GroupContinuous(this IEnumerable<Range> ranges)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Validate parameters.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Can order by start date, no overlaps, no collisionsDi2015NewLine    ranges = ranges.OrderBy(r => r.Start);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Get the enumerator.Di2015NewLine    using (IEnumerator<Range> enumerator = ranges.GetEnumerator();Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Move to the first item, if nothing, break.Di2015NewLine        if (!enumerator.MoveNext()) yield break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Set the previous range.Di2015NewLine        Range previous = enumerator.Current;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Cycle while there are more items.Di2015NewLine        while (enumerator.MoveNext())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Get the current item.Di2015NewLine            Range current = enumerator.Current;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // If the start date is equal to the end dateDi2015NewLine            // then merge with the previous and continue.Di2015NewLine            if (current.Start == previous.End)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Merge.Di2015NewLine                previous = new Range(previous.Start, current.End);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Continue.Di2015NewLine                continue;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Yield the previous item.Di2015NewLine            yield return previous;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // The previous item is the current item.Di2015NewLine            previous = current;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Yield the previous item.Di2015NewLine        yield return previous;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

8102174Di2015UniqueSeparator[SecuritySafeCritical]Di2015NewLinepublic static unsafe long ToInt64(byte[] value, int startIndex)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  if (value == null)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    ThrowHelper.ThrowArgumentNullException(ExceptionArgument.value);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine  if (((ulong) startIndex) >= value.Length)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    ThrowHelper.ThrowArgumentOutOfRangeException(ExceptionArgument.startIndex, ExceptionResource.ArgumentOutOfRange_Index);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine  if (startIndex > (value.Length - 8))Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    ThrowHelper.ThrowArgumentException(ExceptionResource.Arg_ArrayPlusOffTooSmall);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine  fixed (byte* numRef = &(value[startIndex]))Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    if ((startIndex % 8) == 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      return *(((long*) numRef));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    if (IsLittleEndian)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      int num  = ((numRef[0] | (numRef[1] << 8)) | (numRef[2] << 0x10)) | (numRef[3] << 0x18);Di2015NewLine      int num2 = ((numRef[4] | (numRef[5] << 8)) | (numRef[6] << 0x10)) | (numRef[7] << 0x18);Di2015NewLine      return (((long) ((ulong) num)) | (num2 << 0x20));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    int num3 = (((numRef[0] << 0x18) | (numRef[1] << 0x10)) | (numRef[2] << 8)) | numRef[3];Di2015NewLine    int num4 = (((numRef[4] << 0x18) | (numRef[5] << 0x10)) | (numRef[6] << 8)) | numRef[7];Di2015NewLine    return (((long) ((ulong) num4)) | (num3 << 0x20));Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
