8159409Di2015UniqueSeparator// replace a given line in a given text file with a given replacement lineDi2015NewLineprivate void ReplaceLine(string fileName, int lineNrToBeReplaced, string newLine)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    using (IsolatedStorageFile isf = IsolatedStorageFile.GetUserStoreForApplication())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // the memory writer will hold the read and modified linesDi2015NewLine        using (StreamWriter memWriter = new StreamWriter(new MemoryStream()))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // this is for reading lines from the source fileDi2015NewLine            using (StreamReader fileReader = new StreamReader(new IsolatedStorageFileStream(fileName, System.IO.FileMode.Open, isf)))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                int lineCount = 0;Di2015NewLine                // iterate file and read linesDi2015NewLine                while (!fileReader.EndOfStream)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    string line = fileReader.ReadLine();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    // check if this is the line which should be replaced; check is done by line Di2015NewLine                    // number but could also be based on contentDi2015NewLine                    if (lineCount++ != lineNrToBeReplaced)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        // just copy line from fileDi2015NewLine                        memWriter.WriteLine(line);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    elseDi2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        // replace line from fileDi2015NewLine                        memWriter.WriteLine(newLine);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            memWriter.Flush();Di2015NewLine            memWriter.BaseStream.Position = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // re-create file and save all lines from memory to this fileDi2015NewLine            using (IsolatedStorageFileStream fileStream = new IsolatedStorageFileStream(fileName, System.IO.FileMode.Create, isf))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                memWriter.BaseStream.CopyTo(fileStream);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate void button1_Click(object sender, RoutedEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    ReplaceLine("test.txt", 1, "status1 read good");Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
8159454Di2015UniqueSeparatorTrue
8159454Di2015UniqueSeparatorvar where = PredicateBuilder.True<vw_QuickFindResult>();
8159454Di2015UniqueSeparatorFalse
8159454Di2015UniqueSeparatorvar where = PredicateBuilder.False<vw_QuickFindResult>();
8159454Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class PredicateBuilderDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static Expression<Func<T, bool>> True<T>() { return f => true; }Di2015NewLine    public static Expression<Func<T, bool>> False<T>() { return f => false; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static Expression<Func<T, bool>> Or<T>(this Expression<Func<T, bool>> expr1, Expression<Func<T, bool>> expr2)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var invokedExpr = Expression.Invoke(expr2, expr1.Parameters.Cast<Expression>());Di2015NewLine        return Expression.Lambda<Func<T, bool>>(Expression.OrElse(expr1.Body, invokedExpr), expr1.Parameters);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public static Expression<Func<T, bool>> And<T>(this Expression<Func<T, bool>> expr1, Expression<Func<T, bool>> expr2)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var invokedExpr = Expression.Invoke(expr2, expr1.Parameters.Cast<Expression>());Di2015NewLine        return Expression.Lambda<Func<T, bool>>(Expression.AndAlso(expr1.Body, invokedExpr), expr1.Parameters);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinepublic List<QuickFindResult> QueryDocuments(string searchText, string customerSiteId, List<int> filterIds)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var wildCards = new string[] { "*", "\\"" };Di2015NewLine    var where = PredicateBuilder.False<vw_QuickFindResult>();Di2015NewLine    var searches = new List<String>(searchText.Split(' ')); // TODO: <-- If more complex searches are needed we'll have to use RegularExpressionsDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // SEARCH TEXT - WHERE ClauseDi2015NewLine    searches.ForEach(productName =>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Boolean hasWildCards = (productName.IndexOfAny(new char[] { '"', '*' }) != -1);Di2015NewLine        if (hasWildCards)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Int32 length = productName.Length;Di2015NewLine            if (length > 1)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                string like = productName.Replace("%", "")Di2015NewLine                                         .Replace("*", "");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                string first = productName.Substring(0, 1);Di2015NewLine                string last = productName.Substring(length - 1);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // ContainsDi2015NewLine                if (wildCards.Contains(first) && wildCards.Contains(last))Di2015NewLine                    where = where.Or(p => p.DocumentName.Contains(like) ||Di2015NewLine                                         p.DocumentTitle.Contains(like));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // EndsWithDi2015NewLine                else if (wildCards.Contains(first))Di2015NewLine                    where = where.Or(p => p.DocumentName.EndsWith(like) ||Di2015NewLine                                          p.DocumentTitle.EndsWith(like));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // StartsWithDi2015NewLine                else if (wildCards.Contains(last))Di2015NewLine                    where = where.Or(p => p.DocumentName.StartsWith(like) ||Di2015NewLine                                          p.DocumentTitle.StartsWith(like));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Contains (default)Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                    where = where.Or(p => p.DocumentName.Contains(like) ||Di2015NewLine                                          p.DocumentTitle.Contains(like));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            else // Can only perform a "contains"Di2015NewLine                where = where.Or(p => p.DocumentName.Contains(productName) ||Di2015NewLine                                             p.DocumentTitle.Contains(productName));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else // Can only perform a "contains"Di2015NewLine            where = where.Or(p => p.DocumentName.Contains(productName) ||Di2015NewLine                                         p.DocumentTitle.Contains(productName));Di2015NewLine    });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // FILTER IDS - WHERE ClauseDi2015NewLine    var filters = GetAllFilters().Where(x => filterIds.Contains(x.Id)).ToList();Di2015NewLine    filters.ForEach(filter =>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (!filter.IsSection)Di2015NewLine            where = where.And(x => x.FilterName == filter.Name);Di2015NewLine    });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var dataSource = DocumentCollectionService.ListQuickFind(where);Di2015NewLine    var collection = new List<QuickFindResult>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Other UNRELATED stuff happens here...Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return collection;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinepublic static List<vw_QuickFindResult> ListQuickFind(Expression<Func<vw_QuickFindResult, bool>> where)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var connectionString = GetConnectionString(ES_DOCUMENTS_CONNECTION_NAME);Di2015NewLine    List<vw_QuickFindResult> results = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    using (HostingEnvironment.Impersonate())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        using (var dataContext = new ES_DocumentsDataContext(connectionString))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var query = dataContext.vw_QuickFindResults.Where(where).OrderBy(x => x.DocumentName).OrderBy(x => x.DocumentTitle);Di2015NewLine            results = query.ToList();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return results;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

8163197Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq;Di2015NewLineusing System.Reflection;Di2015NewLineusing System.Text;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace ConsoleApplication2Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    class Test2Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public bool BoolProp { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public int[] ArrayProp { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    class Test1Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public string StringProp { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public Dictionary<string, Test2> DictionaryProp { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    class ProgramDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static string ObjToPathKey(object key)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (key == null) return "null";Di2015NewLine            if (key is string) return string.Format("\\"{0}\\"", key);Di2015NewLine            return key.ToString();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public static IEnumerable<KeyValuePair<string, object>> GetFullTree(object root, string currentPath)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (root == null) yield break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            yield return new KeyValuePair<string, object>(currentPath, root);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var type = root.GetType();Di2015NewLine            if (!type.IsClass || type == typeof(string)) yield break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (root is IEnumerable)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (root is IDictionary)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    IDictionary d = (IDictionary) root;Di2015NewLine                    foreach (var key in d.Keys)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        var child = d[key];Di2015NewLine                        foreach (var subchildPair in GetFullTree(child, string.Format("{0}[{1}]", currentPath, ObjToPathKey(key))))Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            yield return subchildPair;Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    yield break;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                int i = 0;Di2015NewLine                if (root is IList)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    foreach (var child in (IEnumerable)root)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        foreach (var subChildPair in GetFullTree(child, string.Format("{0}[{1}]", currentPath, i)))Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            yield return subChildPair;Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                        ++i;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    yield break;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                throw new NotSupportedException();Di2015NewLine {Di2015NewLine                    //TODO: Add indexers supportDi2015NewLine                    object propertyValue = propertyInfo.GetValue(root, null);Di2015NewLine                    foreach (var subChildPair;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        static void Main(string[]                 BoolProp = falseDi2015NewLine                                                                        }Di2015NewLine                                                           }Di2015NewLine                                                   }Di2015NewLine                          };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            foreach (var pair in GetFullTree(t, "t"))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine("{0} = {1}", pair.Key, pair.Value);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Console.Read();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            /* Program output:Di2015NewLine                t = ConsoleApplication2.Test1Di2015NewLine                t.StringProp = Some valueDi2015NewLine                t.DictionaryProp = 8167908Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic interface roman // there is an interface called "roman", accessible to allDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // all implementations of "roman" must have an "indexer" that takes a stringDi2015NewLine    // and returns another "roman" instance (it is not required to offer a "set")Di2015NewLine    // typical usage:Di2015NewLine    //     roman obj = ...Di2015NewLine    //     roman anotherObj = obj["abc"];Di2015NewLine    roman this[string name] { get; }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class notempty : roman // there is a class "notempty", accessible to all,Di2015NewLine{                             // which implements the "roman" interfaceDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // no constructors are declared, so there is a default public parameterlessDi2015NewLine    // constructor which simply calls the parameterless base-constructorDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // any instance of "notempty" has a string property called "Color" which canDi2015NewLine    // be both read (get) and written (set) by any callers; thereDi2015NewLine    // is also a *field* for this, but the compiler is handling that for usDi2015NewLine    public string Color{ get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // there is an indexer that takes a string and returns a "roman"; sinceDi2015NewLine    // there is no *explicit* implementation, this will also be used to satisfyDi2015NewLine    // the "roman" indexer, aka "implicit interface implementation"Di2015NewLine    public roman this[string name]Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // when the indexer is invoked, the string parameter is disregarded; aDi2015NewLine        // new "notempty" instance is created via the parameterless constructor,Di2015NewLine        // and the "Color" property is assigned the string "Value1"; this is thenDi2015NewLine        // returned as "roman", which it is known to implementDi2015NewLine        get { return new notempty() { Color= "Value1" }; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

8171510Di2015UniqueSeparatorPrivate Const DEFAULT_SQL_SERVER_PORT As Integer = 1433Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinePrivate m_SocketConnectedEvent As ManualResetEventDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinePrivate Function PingSQLServer(Optional ByVal wTimeoutSeconds As Integer = -1) As BooleanDi2015NewLine    Dim theSocket As Socket = NothingDi2015NewLine    Dim theHostEntry As IPHostEntryDi2015NewLine    Dim theEndPoint As IPEndPointDi2015NewLine    Dim dtStart As DateDi2015NewLine    Dim theTimeSpan As TimeSpanDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    TryDi2015NewLine        ' Wait a second for the status, by defaultDi2015NewLine        theTimeSpan = New TimeSpan(0, 0, 1)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        ' Get host related information.Di2015NewLine        theHostEntry = Dns.Resolve(Me.MachineName)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        ' Loop through the AddressList to obtain the supported AddressFamily. This is to avoidDi2015NewLine        ' an exception that occurs when the host host IP Address is not compatible with the address familyDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        For Each theAddress As IPAddress In theHostEntry.AddressListDi2015NewLine            dtStart = NowDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            theEndPoint = NothingDi2015NewLine            theEndPoint = New IPEndPoint(theAddress, Me.PortNumber)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            theSocket = NothingDi2015NewLine            theSocket = New Socket(theEndPoint.AddressFamily, SocketType.Stream, ProtocolType.Tcp)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            m_SocketConnectedEvent = NothingDi2015NewLine            m_SocketConnectedEvent = New ManualResetEvent(False)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            ' Wait for a period of time to connect on this IP address/port comboDi2015NewLine            ' If the connect succeeds, get out.Di2015NewLine            theSocket.Blocking = FalseDi2015NewLine            theSocket.Bind(New IPEndPoint(IPAddress.Any, 0))Di2015NewLine            theSocket.BeginConnect(theEndPoint, AddressOf ConnectCallback, theSocket)Di2015NewLine            DoDi2015NewLine                If m_SocketConnectedEvent.WaitOne(theTimeSpan, False) ThenDi2015NewLine                    Exit DoDi2015NewLine                End IfDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                Me.IdleDelegate.Invoke(-1, True)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                If wTimeoutSeconds <> -1 ThenDi2015NewLine                    If Now.Subtract(dtStart).TotalSeconds >= wTimeoutSeconds ThenDi2015NewLine                        TryDi2015NewLine                            theSocket.Shutdown(SocketShutdown.Both)Di2015NewLine                        CatchDi2015NewLine                        End TryDi2015NewLine                        TryDi2015NewLine                            theSocket.Close()Di2015NewLine                        CatchDi2015NewLine                        End TryDi2015NewLine                        theSocket = NothingDi2015NewLine                        Exit DoDi2015NewLine                    End IfDi2015NewLine                End IfDi2015NewLine            LoopDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            If theSocket IsNot Nothing ThenDi2015NewLine                If theSocket.Connected ThenDi2015NewLine                    Return TrueDi2015NewLine                End IfDi2015NewLine            End IfDi2015NewLine        NextDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Catch theException As ExceptionDi2015NewLine        Call ReportError(theException)Di2015NewLine    FinallyDi2015NewLine        If m_SocketConnectedEvent IsNot Nothing ThenDi2015NewLine            TryDi2015NewLine                m_SocketConnectedEvent.Close()Di2015NewLine            CatchDi2015NewLine            FinallyDi2015NewLine                m_SocketConnectedEvent = NothingDi2015NewLine            End TryDi2015NewLine        End IfDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        If theSocket IsNot Nothing ThenDi2015NewLine            TryDi2015NewLine                theSocket.Shutdown(SocketShutdown.Both)Di2015NewLine            CatchDi2015NewLine            End TryDi2015NewLine            TryDi2015NewLine                theSocket.Close()Di2015NewLine            CatchDi2015NewLine            End TryDi2015NewLine            theSocket = NothingDi2015NewLine        End IfDi2015NewLine    End TryDi2015NewLineEnd FunctionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinePrivate Sub ConnectCallback(ByVal ar As IAsyncResult)Di2015NewLine    TryDi2015NewLine        ' Retrieve the socket from the state object.Di2015NewLine        Dim theClient As SocketDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        theClient = DirectCast(ar.AsyncState, Socket)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        ' Complete the connection.Di2015NewLine        If theClient IsNot Nothing ThenDi2015NewLine            theClient.EndConnect(ar)Di2015NewLine        End IfDi2015NewLine    Catch theDisposedException As System.ObjectDisposedExceptionDi2015NewLine        ' Ignore this errorDi2015NewLine    Catch theSocketException As SocketExceptionDi2015NewLine        Select Case theSocketException.ErrorCodeDi2015NewLine            ' Connection actively refusedDi2015NewLine            Case 10061Di2015NewLine                ' Don't report the error; it's just that SQL Server isn't answering.Di2015NewLine            Case ElseDi2015NewLine                Call ReportError(theSocketException)Di2015NewLine        End SelectDi2015NewLine    Catch theException As ExceptionDi2015NewLine        Call ReportError(theException)Di2015NewLine    FinallyDi2015NewLine        ' Signal that the connection has been made.Di2015NewLine        If m_SocketConnectedEvent IsNot Nothing ThenDi2015NewLine            m_SocketConnectedEvent.Set()Di2015NewLine        End IfDi2015NewLine    End TryDi2015NewLineEnd SubDi2015NewLine

8174386Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static string Convert(ulong number)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var validCharacters = "qwertyuiopasdfghjklzxcvbnmQWERTYUIOPASDFGHJKLZXCVBNM1234567890!@#$%^&()_-";Di2015NewLine    char[] charArray = validCharacters.ToCharArray();Di2015NewLine    var buffer = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine    var quotient = number;Di2015NewLine    ulong remainder;Di2015NewLine    while (quotient != 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        remainder = quotient % (ulong)charArray.LongLength;Di2015NewLine        quotient = quotient / (ulong)charArray.LongLength;Di2015NewLine        buffer.Insert(0, charArray[remainder].ToString());Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return buffer.ToString();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

8176121Di2015UniqueSeparator        protected override void OnResize(EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        base.OnResize(e);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Scale the controlDi2015NewLine        ScaleChildren(this, ref _initialFormSize);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public static void ScaleChildren(Control control, ref Size initialSize, float fontFactor)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (control == null || control.Size == initialSize)Di2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        SizeF scaleFactor = new SizeF((float)control.Width / (float)initialSize.Width, (float)control.Height / (float)initialSize.Height);Di2015NewLine        initialSize = control.Size;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (!float.IsInfinity(scaleFactor.Width) || !float.IsInfinity(scaleFactor.Height))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            foreach (Control child in control.Controls)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                child.Scale(scaleFactor);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (child is Panel)Di2015NewLine                    continue;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                tryDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    // scale the fontDi2015NewLine                    float scaledFontSize = (float)(int)(child.Font.Size * scaleFactor.Height * fontFactor + 0.5f);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    System.Diagnostics.Debug.WriteLine(Di2015NewLine                        string.Format("ScaleChildren(): scaleFactor = ({0}, {1}); fontFactor = {2}; scaledFontSize = {3}; \\"{4}\\"",Di2015NewLine                        scaleFactor.Width, scaleFactor.Height, fontFactor, scaledFontSize, child.Text));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    child.Font = new Font(child.Font.Name, scaledFontSize, child.Font.Style);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                catch { }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

8176414Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic IEnumerable<object> Try_Filter(IEnumerable<object> collection,Di2015NewLine string property_name, string value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var objTypeDictionary = new Dictionary<Type, PropertyInfo>();Di2015NewLine        var predicateFunc = new Func<Object, String, String, bool>((obj, propName, propValue) => {Di2015NewLine            var objType = obj.GetType();Di2015NewLine            PropertyInfo property = null;Di2015NewLine            if(!objTypeDictionary.ContainsKey(objType))Di2015NewLine            {           Di2015NewLine                property = objType.GetProperties(BindingFlags.Public | BindingFlags.NonPublic | BindingFlags.Instance).FirstOrDefault(prop => prop.Name == propName);Di2015NewLine                objTypeDictionary[objType] = property;Di2015NewLine            } else {Di2015NewLine                property = objTypeDictionary[objType];Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            if(property != null && property.GetValue(obj, null).ToString() == propValue)Di2015NewLine                return true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine        });Di2015NewLine        return collection.Where(obj => predicateFunc(obj, property_name, value));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

8178934Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic bool TableContainsAnyRows()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine   // define a TOP 1 query - typically by the Primary Key of the table in questionDi2015NewLine   // using AdventureWorks sample database hereDi2015NewLine   string stmt = "SELECT TOP 1 [BusinessEntityID] FROM Person.Person ORDER BY [BusinessEntityID]";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   bool containsAnyRows = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   // open a connection and execute this query against the database Di2015NewLine   using(SqlConnection _con = new SqlConnection("server=.;database=AdventureWorks2008R2;integrated Security=SSPI;"))Di2015NewLine   using(SqlCommand _cmd = new SqlCommand(stmt, _con))Di2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine       _con.Open();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine       // getting the result of the queryDi2015NewLine       // if the table contains *any* rows, the result will *NOT* be NULLDi2015NewLine       object result = _cmd.ExecuteScalar();Di2015NewLine       _con.Close();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine       containsAnyRows = (result != null);Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   return containsAnyRows;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

8179045Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic class ArraysDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static void Each<T>(this Array a,Di2015NewLine                               Action<int[], T> proc,Di2015NewLine                               int[] startAt = null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int rank = startAt == null ? 0 : startAt.Length;Di2015NewLine        int[] indices = new int[rank + 1];Di2015NewLine        if (rank > 0)Di2015NewLine            startAt.CopyTo(indices, 0);Di2015NewLine        for (int i = a.GetLowerBound(rank); i <= a.GetUpperBound(rank); i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            indices[rank] = i;Di2015NewLine            if (rank == a.Rank - 1)Di2015NewLine                proc(indices, (T)a.GetValue(indices));Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine                Each(a, proc, indices);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

8184302Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic byte[] encryptData(byte[] source, string key, bool padding)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    byte[] encryptedSource = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    byte[] btKeyInBytes = UTF8Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes(key);Di2015NewLine    Rfc2898DeriveBytes rfc = new Rfc2898DeriveBytes(key, btKeyInBytes);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    AesManaged encryptor = new AesManaged();Di2015NewLine    //encryptor.Mode = CipherMode.CFB; Di2015NewLine    encryptor.KeySize = 128;          // in bits     Di2015NewLine    encryptor.Key = new byte[128 / 8];  // 16 bytes for 128 bit encryption     Di2015NewLine    encryptor.IV = new byte[128 / 8];Di2015NewLine    if (padding) { encryptor.Padding = PaddingMode.PKCS7; }Di2015NewLine    else { encryptor.Padding = PaddingMode.None; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    using (MemoryStream encryptStream = new MemoryStream())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        using (CryptoStream encStream =Di2015NewLine                   new CryptoStream(encryptStream,Di2015NewLine                                    encryptor.CreateEncryptor(rfc.GetBytes(16),Di2015NewLine                                                              rfc.GetBytes(16)),Di2015NewLine                                    CryptoStreamMode.Write))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //Read from the input stream, then encrypt and write to the output stream.Di2015NewLine            encStream.Write(source, 0, source.Length);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        encryptStream.Flush();Di2015NewLine        encryptedSource = encryptStream.ToArray();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return encryptedSource;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic byte[] decryptData(byte[] source, string key,bool padding)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    byte[] encryptedSource = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    byte[] btKeyInBytes = UTF8Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes(key);Di2015NewLine    Rfc2898DeriveBytes rfc = new Rfc2898DeriveBytes(key, btKeyInBytes);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    AesManaged encryptor = new AesManaged();Di2015NewLine    encryptor.Key = new byte[128 / 8];  // 16 bytes for 128 bit encryption     Di2015NewLine    encryptor.IV = new byte[128 / 8];Di2015NewLine    if (padding) { encryptor.Padding = PaddingMode.PKCS7; }Di2015NewLine    else { encryptor.Padding = PaddingMode.None; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    using (MemoryStream encryptStream = new MemoryStream())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        using (CryptoStream encStream =Di2015NewLine                 new CryptoStream(encryptStream,Di2015NewLine                                  encryptor.CreateDecryptor(rfc.GetBytes(16),Di2015NewLine                                                            rfc.GetBytes(16)),Di2015NewLine                                  CryptoStreamMode.Write))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //Read from the input stream, then encrypt and write to the output stream.Di2015NewLine            encStream.Write(source, 0, source.Length);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        encryptStream.Flush();Di2015NewLine        encryptedSource = encryptStream.ToArray();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return encryptedSource;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

8185075Di2015UniqueSeparatorOutlookViewOverflowGrip
8185075Di2015UniqueSeparator/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// Adjusts the position of the Outlook overflow grip.Di2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLinepublic void AdjustOutlookViewOverflowGrip()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (ViewMode == PageViewMode.Outlook && SelectedPage != null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Fix rendering bug by hiding RadPageViewPage's that are not currently selectedDi2015NewLine        foreach (RadPageViewPage page in Pages)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (page == SelectedPage)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                page.Show();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                page.Hide();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Elements from controlDi2015NewLine        RadPageViewOutlookElement outlookElement = (RadPageViewOutlookElement)ViewElement;Di2015NewLine        OverflowItemsContainer overflowItemsContainer = (OverflowItemsContainer)GetChildAt(0).GetChildAt(4);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Selected page and item heightsDi2015NewLine        int selectedPageMinHeight = (SelectedPage.MinimumSize.Height > ContentMinimumHeight ? SelectedPage.MinimumSize.Height : contentMinimumHeight);Di2015NewLine        int pageSelectorHeight = SelectedPage.Item.Size.Height;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Show or hide itemsDi2015NewLine        if (pageSelectorHeight > 0 && selectedPageMinHeight > 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Calculate content area heightDi2015NewLine            int contentAreaHeight =                 Di2015NewLine                (Di2015NewLine                    Size.Height -Di2015NewLine                    (Di2015NewLine                        from element in ((RadPageViewOutlookElement)ViewElement).ChildrenDi2015NewLine                        whereDi2015NewLine                        (Di2015NewLine                            element.Visibility != ElementVisibility.CollapsedDi2015NewLine                            &&Di2015NewLine                            (Di2015NewLine                                element is RadPageViewLabelElementDi2015NewLine                                || element is OutlookViewOverflowGripDi2015NewLine                                || element is RadPageViewOutlookItemDi2015NewLine                                || element is OverflowItemsContainerDi2015NewLine                            )Di2015NewLine                        )Di2015NewLine                        select element.Size.Height + element.Margin.VerticalDi2015NewLine                    )Di2015NewLine                    .Sum()Di2015NewLine                );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (contentAreaHeight < selectedPageMinHeight)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Factor in OverflowItemsContainer height if it's currently collapsedDi2015NewLine                int overflowItemsHeight = (overflowItemsContainer.Visibility == ElementVisibility.Collapsed ? overflowItemsContainer.Size.Height : 0);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Not enough space available... hide itemsDi2015NewLine                int hide = (int)Math.Ceiling((double)(selectedPageMinHeight - contentAreaHeight + overflowItemsHeight) / (double)pageSelectorHeight);Di2015NewLine                if (hide > 0)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    outlookElement.HideItems(hide);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            else if (contentAreaHeight >= (selectedPageMinHeight + pageSelectorHeight))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // More space available... show itemsDi2015NewLine                int show = (int)Math.Floor((double)(contentAreaHeight - selectedPageMinHeight) / (double)pageSelectorHeight);Di2015NewLine                if (show > 0)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    outlookElement.ShowItems(show);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Set overflow container visiblityDi2015NewLine        overflowItemsContainer.Visibility = (outlookElement.GetHiddenItems().Length > 0 ? ElementVisibility.Visible : ElementVisibility.Collapsed);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

8186559Di2015UniqueSeparator// Assume "size" is the batch sizeDi2015NewLinevar query = source.Select((value, index) => new { value, index })Di2015NewLine                  .GroupBy(pair => pair.index / size, pair => pair.value);Di2015NewLine
8186559Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static void Main(String[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int[] source = { 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7 };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var skeet = SkeetAnswer(source, 3);Di2015NewLine        var fisher = FisherAnswer(source, 3);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Size of the first element of Skeet's solution:");Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(skeet.First().Count());Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(skeet.First().Count());Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(skeet.First().Count());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Size of the first element of Fisher's solution:");Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(fisher.First().Count());Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(fisher.First().Count());Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(fisher.First().Count());Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static IEnumerable<IEnumerable<int>> SkeetAnswer(IEnumerable<int> source,Di2015NewLine                                                     int size)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return source.Select((value, index) => new { value, index })Di2015NewLine                     .GroupBy(pair => pair.index / size, pair => pair.value);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static IEnumerable<IEnumerable<int>> FisherAnswer(IEnumerable<int> source,Di2015NewLine                                                      int size)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int index = 0;Di2015NewLine        return source.GroupBy(x => (index++ / size));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

8187177Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class HandleHookedListView: ListViewDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private EventHandler _handleCreatedEvent;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public HandleHookedListView(): base()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _handleCreatedEvent = new EventHandler(HandleHookedControl_HandleCreated);Di2015NewLine        this.HandleCreated += _handleCreatedEvent;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private bool _handleIsCreated;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public bool HandleIsCreatedDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return _handleIsCreated; }Di2015NewLine        set { _handleIsCreated = value; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    void HandleHookedControl_HandleCreated(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Debug.Print("Handle Created");Di2015NewLine        this.HandleIsCreated = true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Unhook the delegateDi2015NewLine        if (_handleCreatedEvent != null)Di2015NewLine            this.HandleCreated -= _handleCreatedEvent;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
8187177Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void updateView()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var handleCreated = this.list.HandleIsCreated;Di2015NewLine    if (this.list.InvokeRequired && handleCreated)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Handle is created and invoke is required.Di2015NewLine        this.list.Invoke(new MethodInvoker(() => { updateView(); }));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    else if (handleCreated)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // In this case your control's handle has been created and invoke really Di2015NewLine        // isn't required go ahead and do the updateDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        this.list.Items.Clear();Di2015NewLine        this.list.Items.AddRange(this.underlyingToListItems());Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // You cannot update yet.  The handle has not been created.  Depending on ifDi2015NewLine        // you need to "queue" these updates you can either collect them or just Di2015NewLine        // ignore them if a subsequent call to updateView() after the handle has beenDi2015NewLine        // created will be sufficientDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

8188878Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.IO;Di2015NewLineusing System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Binary;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static void Main(String[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Random rng = new Random();Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Values before saving...");Di2015NewLine        ShowValues(rng);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        BinaryFormatter formatter = new BinaryFormatter(); Di2015NewLine        MemoryStream stream = new MemoryStream();Di2015NewLine        formatter.Serialize(stream, rng);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Values after saving...");Di2015NewLine        ShowValues(rng);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        stream.Position = 0; // Rewind ready for readingDi2015NewLine        Random restored = (Random) formatter.Deserialize(stream);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Values after restoring...");Di2015NewLine        ShowValues(restored);       Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static void ShowValues(Random rng)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < 5; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine(rng.Next(100));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

8189532Di2015UniqueSeparatorT
8189532Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static Func<XElement, bool> GetPredicate<T>(Criterion criterion)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var arg = Expression.Parameter(typeof(XElement), "arg");Di2015NewLine    var name = Expression.Constant((XName)criterion.PropertyName);Di2015NewLine    var attr = Expression.Call(arg, "Attribute", null, name);Di2015NewLine    var left = Expression.Convert(attr, typeof(T));Di2015NewLine    var right = Expression.Constant(criterion.PropertyValue, typeof(T));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Expression body;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    switch (criterion.CriteriaOperator)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine    case CriteriaOperator.Equal:Di2015NewLine        body = Expression.Equal(left, right);Di2015NewLine        break;Di2015NewLine    case CriteriaOperator.GreaterThan:Di2015NewLine        body = Expression.GreaterThan(left, right);Di2015NewLine        break;Di2015NewLine    default:Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentException("Criteria Operator not supported.");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return Expression.Lambda<Func<XElement, bool>>(body, arg).Compile();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

8190354Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static void Duel(Random rng, String user, String user1, String user2)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Using Next(2, 12) doesn't really mimic 2 dice of 1-6; it actually mimicsDi2015NewLine    // a single 10-sided die with values 2 to 11 inclusive.Di2015NewLine    int score1 = rng.Next(1, 7) + rng.Next(1, 7);Di2015NewLine    int score2 = rng.Next(1, 7) + rng.Next(1, 7);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Note: this is biased in favour of user2 in case of equalityDi2015NewLine    string winner = score1 > score2 ? user1 : user2;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("{0} started a duel between {0} and {1}!",Di2015NewLine                      user, user1, user2);Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("{0} rolled {1} and {2} rolled {3}!", user1, score1,Di2015NewLine                      user2, score2);Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("{0} is the winner!", winner);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

8194829Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class OrderByExpression<TEntity, TOrderBy> : IOrderByExpression<TEntity>Di2015NewLine    where TEntity : classDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private Expression<Func<TEntity, TOrderBy>> _expression;Di2015NewLine    private bool _descending;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public OrderByExpression(Expression<Func<TEntity, TOrderBy>> expression,Di2015NewLine        bool descending = false)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _expression = expression;Di2015NewLine        _descending = descending;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public IOrderedQueryable<TEntity> ApplyOrderBy(Di2015NewLine        IQueryable<TEntity> query)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (_descending)Di2015NewLine            return query.OrderByDescending(_expression);Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine            return query.OrderBy(_expression);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public IOrderedQueryable<TEntity> ApplyThenBy(Di2015NewLine        IOrderedQueryable<TEntity> query)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (_descending)Di2015NewLine            return query.ThenByDescending(_expression);Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine            return query.ThenBy(_expression);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
8194829Di2015UniqueSeparatorApplyOrderBy
8194829Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic IQueryable<TEntity> ApplyOrderBy<TEntity>(IQueryable<TEntity> query,Di2015NewLine    params IOrderByExpression<TEntity>[] orderByExpressions)Di2015NewLine    where TEntity : classDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (orderByExpressions == null)Di2015NewLine        return query;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    IOrderedQueryable<TEntity> output = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (var orderByExpression in orderByExpressions)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (output == null)Di2015NewLine            output = orderByExpression.ApplyOrderBy(query);Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine            output = orderByExpression.ApplyThenBy(output);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return output ?? query;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

8198122Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic bool HasJpegHeader(string filename)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    using (BinaryReader br = new BinaryReader(File.Open(filename, FileMode.Open)))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        UInt16 soi = br.ReadUInt16();  // Start of Image (SOI) marker (FFD8)Di2015NewLine        UInt16 jfif = br.ReadUInt16(); // JFIF marker (FFE0)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return soi == 0xd8ff && jfif == 0xe0ff;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
8198122Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic bool IsJpgImage(string filename)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    tryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        System.Drawing.Image img = System.Drawing.Image.FromFile(filename);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Two image formats can be compared using the Equals methodDi2015NewLine        // See http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/system.drawing.imaging.imageformat.aspxDi2015NewLine        //Di2015NewLine        return img.RawFormat.Equals(System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat.Jpeg);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    catch (OutOfMemoryException)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Image.FromFile throws an OutOfMemoryException Di2015NewLine        // if the file does not have a valid image format orDi2015NewLine        // GDI+ does not support the pixel format of the file.Di2015NewLine        //Di2015NewLine        return false;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

8201464Di2015UniqueSeparatorstring[] items = { "A", "B", "C", "D", "E", "F", "G", "H", "I", "J" };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevar combinations = Di2015NewLine    from a in itemsDi2015NewLine    from b in itemsDi2015NewLine    where a.CompareTo(b) < 0Di2015NewLine    orderby a, bDi2015NewLine    select new { A = a, B = b };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineforeach(var pair in combinations)Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("({0}, {1})", pair.A, pair.B);Di2015NewLine
8201464Di2015UniqueSeparatorstring[] items = { "A", "B", "C", "D", "E", "F", "G", "H", "I", "J" };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevar combinations = Di2015NewLine    from a in itemsDi2015NewLine    from b in itemsDi2015NewLine    from c in itemsDi2015NewLine    where a.CompareTo(b) < 0 && b.CompareTo(c) < 0Di2015NewLine    orderby a, b, cDi2015NewLine    select new { A = a, B = b, C = c };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineforeach(var triplet in combinations)Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("({0}, {1}, {2})", triplet.A, triplet.B, triplet.C);Di2015NewLine
8201464Di2015UniqueSeparatorLinkedNode

Value : Value + ", " + Next.ToString();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

8203236Di2015UniqueSeparatorPublic enum Direction {Di2015NewLine  None,Di2015NewLine  LeftUp, Up, RightUp, Right, RightDown, Down, LeftDown, LeftDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic Direction GetDirection(double x, double y) {Di2015NewLine  double absX = Math.Abs(x);Di2015NewLine  double absY = Math.Abs(y);Di2015NewLine  if (absX < 0.1 && absY < 0.1) {Di2015NewLine    // close to centerDi2015NewLine    return Direction.None;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine  if (absX > absY) {Di2015NewLine    // vertical sideDi2015NewLine    double half = absX * 0.4142;Di2015NewLine    if (x > 0) {Di2015NewLine      // left sideDi2015NewLine      if (y > half) return Direction.LeftDown;Di2015NewLine      if (y < -half) return Diretion.LeftUp;Di2015NewLine      return Direction.Left;Di2015NewLine    } else {Di2015NewLine      // right sideDi2015NewLine      if (y > half) return Direction.RightDown;Di2015NewLine      if (y < -half) return Direction.RightUp;Di2015NewLine      return Direction.Right;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  } else {Di2015NewLine    // horisontal sideDi2015NewLine    double half = absY * 0.4142;Di2015NewLine    if (y > 0) {Di2015NewLine      // bottomDi2015NewLine      if (x > half) return Direction.RightDown;Di2015NewLine      if (x < -half) return Direction.LeftDown;Di2015NewLine      return Direction.Down;Di2015NewLine    } else {Di2015NewLine      // topDi2015NewLine      if (x > half) return Direction.RightUp;Di2015NewLine      if (x < -half) return Direction.LeftUp;Di2015NewLine      return Direction.Up;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

8205093Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic ProgramState DeserializeState(string filename)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine if (File.Exists(filename))Di2015NewLine {Di2015NewLine  ProgramState res = new ProgramState();Di2015NewLine  Stream s = File.Open(filename, FileMode.Open);Di2015NewLine  BinaryFormatter bFormatter = new BinaryFormatter();Di2015NewLine  bFormatter.AssemblyFormat =Di2015NewLine    System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.FormatterAssemblyStyle.Simple;Di2015NewLine  bFormatter.Binder = new MyBinder(); // MyBinder class code given belowDi2015NewLine  tryDi2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine   res = (ProgramState)bFormatter.Deserialize(s);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine  catch (SerializationException se)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine   Debug.WriteLine(se.Message);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine  s.Close();Di2015NewLine  return res;Di2015NewLine }Di2015NewLine else return new ProgramState();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
8205093Di2015UniqueSeparatorinternal sealed class MyBinder : SerializationBinderDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine public override Type BindToType(string assemblyName, string typeName)Di2015NewLine {Di2015NewLine  Type ttd = null;Di2015NewLine  tryDi2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine   string toassname = assemblyName.Split(',')[0];Di2015NewLine   Assembly[] asmblies = AppDomain.CurrentDomain.GetAssemblies();Di2015NewLine   foreach (Assembly ass in asmblies)Di2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine    if (ass.FullName.Split(',')[0] == toassname)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine     ttd = ass.GetType(typeName);Di2015NewLine     break;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine  catch (System.Exception e)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine   Debug.WriteLine(e.Message);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine  return ttd;Di2015NewLine }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

    StringBuilder toString = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            toString.Append("Vsan with Number: ");Di2015NewLine            toString.Append(number);Di2015NewLine         toString.Append("Intefaces with Name: ");Di2015NewLine                toString.Append(@interface.Name);Di2015NewLine                toString.AppendLine("");Di2015NewLine }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    class Interface : IInterface {Di2015NewLine        private readonly string name;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public Interface(string name) internal abstract class AbstractToken : IToken {Di2015NewLine        private readonly string value;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public AbstractToken(string value) {Di2015NewLine            this.value = value;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        #region Implementation of ITokenDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public string Value {Di2015NewLine            get { return value; }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        #endregionDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    class VsanToken : AbstractToken, IVsanToken {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private readonly int vsanInterfaceNumber;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public VsanToken(string value)Di2015NewLine            : base(value) {Di2015NewLine            vsanInterfaceNumber = int.Parse(value);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        #region Implementation of IVsanTokenDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public int VsanInterfaceNumber {Di2015NewLine            get { return vsanInterfaceNumber; }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        #endregionDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    class InterfaceToken : AbstractToken, IInterfaceToken {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private readonly int firstNumber;Di2015NewLine        private readonly int secondNumber;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public InterfaceToken(string value)Di2015NewLine            : base(value) {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Match match = Regex.Match(value, "fc([0-9])/([0-9]+)");Di2015NewLine            Group firstNumberGroup = match.Groups[1];Di2015NewLine            Group secondNumberGroup = match.Groups[2];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            firstNumber = int.Parse(firstNumberGroup.Value);Di2015NewLine            secondNumber = int.Parse(secondNumberGroup.Value);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public int SecondNumber {Di2015NewLine            get { return secondNumber; }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public int FirstNumber {Di2015NewLine            get { return firstNumber; }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    interface IInterfaceToken : IToken {Di2015NewLine        //Edited: Added Second and FirstNumber to Interface so it can be accessedDi2015NewLine        int SecondNumber { get; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int FirstNumber { get ; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    class VSanTokenizer {Di2015NewLine        private readonly string vSanString;Di2015NewLine        private IList<IToken> tokens;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public VSanTokenizer(string vSanString) {Di2015NewLine            this.vSanString = vSanString;Di2015NewLine            tokens = Tokenize(vSanString);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public string VSanString {Di2015NewLine            get { return vSanString; }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private IList<IToken> Tokenize(string vSanString) {Di2015NewLine            List<IToken> tokens = new List<IToken>();Di2015NewLine            StringReader reader = new StringReader(vSanString);Di2015NewLine            string readLine = reader.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine            while (readLine != null) {Di2015NewLine                IList<IToken> tokenizeLine = TokenizeLine(readLine);Di2015NewLine                tokens.AddRange(tokenizeLine);Di2015NewLine                readLine = reader.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return tokens;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private IList<IToken> TokenizeLine(string readLine) {Di2015NewLine            IList<IToken> tokens = new List<IToken>();Di2015NewLine            Match vsanInterfaceDeclartion = Regex.Match(readLine, "vsan ([0-9]+) interfaces:");Di2015NewLine            if (vsanInterfaceDeclartion.Success) {Di2015NewLine                Group numberGroup = vsanInterfaceDeclartion.Groups[1];Di2015NewLine                VsanToken vsanToken = new VsanToken(numberGroup.Value);Di2015NewLine                tokens.Add(vsanToken);Di2015NewLine                return tokens;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Match vsanInterface = Regex.Match(readLine, "(fc[0-9]/[0-9]+)");Di2015NewLine            if (vsanInterface.Success) {Di2015NewLine                GroupCollection groupCollection = vsanInterface.Groups;Di2015NewLine                foreach (Group vsanInterfaceGroup in groupCollection) {Di2015NewLine                    string value = vsanInterfaceGroup.Value;Di2015NewLine                    IToken token = new InterfaceToken(value);Di2015NewLine                    tokens.Add(token);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return tokens;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public IList<IToken> Tokens {Di2015NewLine            get {Di2015NewLine                return tokens;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    class VsanTokenInterpreter {Di2015NewLine        private readonly IList<IToken> tokens;Di2015NewLine        private readonly IList<IVSan> vSans;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public VsanTokenInterpreter(IList<IToken> tokens) {Di2015NewLine            this.tokens = tokens;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            this.vSans = ParseTokens(tokens);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private IList<IVSan> ParseTokens(IList<IToken> tokens) {Di2015NewLine            IList<IVSan> vsans = new List<IVSan>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            IVSan currentVSan = null;Di2015NewLine            foreach (IToken token in tokens) {Di2015NewLine                if (token is IVsanToken) {Di2015NewLine                    currentVSan = CreateVSan((IVsanToken)token);Di2015NewLine                    vsans.Add(currentVSan);Di2015NewLine                } else if (token is IInterfaceToken) {Di2015NewLine                    if (currentVSan == null)Di2015NewLine                        throw new Exception("First Vsan Line has to be declared!");Di2015NewLine                    IInterface inter = CreateInterface((IInterfaceToken)token);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    currentVSan.Interfaces.Add(inter);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return vsans;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        protected virtual IInterface CreateInterface(IInterfaceToken interfaceToken) {Di2015NewLine            //Edited: you can now access the First/Second Number from the Interface Token and use it to create the Instance of your interface:Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            int firstNumber = interfaceToken.FirstNumber;Di2015NewLine            int secondNumber = interfaceToken.SecondNumber;Di2015NewLine            return new Interface(interfaceToken.Value);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        protected virtual IVSan CreateVSan(IVsanToken vsanToken) {Di2015NewLine            return new VSan(vsanToken.VsanInterfaceNumber, new List<IInterface>());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public IList<IVSan> VSans {Di2015NewLine            get { return vSans; }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public IList<IToken> Tokens {Di2015NewLine            get { return tokens; }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

8212552Di2015UniqueSeparatorfunction getAccessToken(){Di2015NewLine    $token_url = 'https://graph.facebook.com/oauth/access_token?client_id='.APP_ID.'&client_secret='.APP_SECRET.'&grant_type=client_credentials';Di2015NewLine    return makeRequest($token_url);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinefunction makeRequest( $url, $timeout = 5 ) {Di2015NewLine    $ch = curl_init();Di2015NewLine    curl_setopt( $ch, CURLOPT_USERAGENT, "PHP_APP" );Di2015NewLine    curl_setopt( $ch, CURLOPT_URL, $url );Di2015NewLine    curl_setopt( $ch, CURLOPT_ENCODING, "" );Di2015NewLine    curl_setopt( $ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, true );Di2015NewLine    curl_setopt( $ch, CURLOPT_AUTOREFERER, true );Di2015NewLine    curl_setopt( $ch, CURLOPT_SSL_VERIFYPEER, false );    # required for https urlsDi2015NewLine    curl_setopt( $ch, CURLOPT_CONNECTTIMEOUT, $timeout );Di2015NewLine    curl_setopt( $ch, CURLOPT_TIMEOUT, $timeout );Di2015NewLine    curl_setopt( $ch, CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS, 10 );Di2015NewLine    $content = curl_exec( $ch );Di2015NewLine    $response = curl_getinfo( $ch );Di2015NewLine    curl_close ( $ch );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if($response['http_code'] == 200) return $content;Di2015NewLine    return FALSE;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
8212571Di2015UniqueSeparator public static void Compress(FileInfo sourceFile, string destinationFileName,string destinationTempFileName)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Crc32 crc = new Crc32();Di2015NewLine            string zipFile = Path.Combine(sourceFile.Directory.FullName, destinationTempFileName);Di2015NewLine            zipFile = Path.ChangeExtension(zipFile, ZIP_EXTENSION);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            using (FileStream fs = File.Create(zipFile))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                using (ZipOutputStream zOut = new ZipOutputStream(fs))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    zOut.SetLevel(9);Di2015NewLine                    ZipEntry entry = new ZipEntry(ZipEntry.CleanName(destinationFileName));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    entry.DateTime = DateTime.Now;Di2015NewLine                    entry.ZipFileIndex = 1;Di2015NewLine                    entry.Size = sourceFile.Length;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    using (FileStream sourceStream = sourceFile.OpenRead())Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        crc.Reset();Di2015NewLine                        long len = sourceFile.Length;Di2015NewLine                        byte[] buffer = new byte[bufferSize];Di2015NewLine                        while (len > 0)Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            int readSoFar = sourceStream.Read(buffer, 0, buffer.Length);Di2015NewLine                            crc.Update(buffer, 0, readSoFar);Di2015NewLine                            len -= readSoFar;Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                        entry.Crc = crc.Value;Di2015NewLine                        zOut.PutNextEntry(entry);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        len = sourceStream.Length;Di2015NewLine                        sourceStream.Seek(0, SeekOrigin.Begin);Di2015NewLine                        while (len > 0)Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            int readSoFar = sourceStream.Read(buffer, 0, buffer.Length);Di2015NewLine                            zOut.Write(buffer, 0, readSoFar);Di2015NewLine                            len -= readSoFar;Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    zOut.Finish();Di2015NewLine                    zOut.Close();Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                fs.Close();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine

8219159Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate string ExecuteRequest(Uri url, KeyValuePair<string, string>[] postItems = null)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var data = new byte[0];Di2015NewLine    var response = new byte[0];Di2015NewLine    ///switched to WebClient becauseDi2015NewLine    /// http://stackoverflow.com/questions/8167726/monodroid-intermittent-failure-when-reading-a-large-json-string-from-web-serviDi2015NewLine    using (var client = new WebClient())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (postItems != null && postItems.Count() > 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            string dataString = string.Join("&", postItems.Select(Di2015NewLine                                    item => string.Format("{0}={1}", item.Key, item.Value)).ToArray());Di2015NewLine            data = new ASCIIEncoding().GetBytes(dataString);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        response = client.UploadData(url, "POST", data);Di2015NewLine        Android.Util.Log.Info("info", "response from the post received. about to get string");Di2015NewLine        client.Dispose();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    tryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Android.Util.Log.Info("info", "response size : {0}", response.Length);Di2015NewLine        var chunkSize = 50000;Di2015NewLine        if (response.Length > chunkSize)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var returnValue = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < response.Length; i+= chunkSize)Di2015NewLine            {                        Di2015NewLine                int end = (i + chunkSize) > response.Length ? response.Length - i : chunkSize;Di2015NewLine                returnValue.Append(Encoding.ASCII.GetString(response, i, end));Di2015NewLine                Android.Util.Log.Info("info", "added a chunk from {0} to {1}", i, end);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return returnValue.ToString();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return Encoding.ASCII.GetString(response);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Android.Util.Log.Info("info", Di2015NewLine            "Encoding.ASCII.GetString Exception : {0}, {1}", ex.Message, ex.StackTrace);Di2015NewLine        throw new ApplicationException("UnRecoverable. Abort");Di2015NewLine    }            Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

8220374Di2015UniqueSeparatorABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQDi2015NewLineA               Q  Di2015NewLine        IDi2015NewLine    E       MDi2015NewLine  C   G   K   ODi2015NewLine B D F H J L N PDi2015NewLine
8220374Di2015UniqueSeparatorInput: the size of the array.Di2015NewLineYield the first item -- if there is oneDi2015NewLineYield the last item -- if it is different from the first item.Di2015NewLineMake a queue of intervals.Di2015NewLineEnqueue the interval (0, array.Length - 1) Di2015NewLineWhile the queue is not empty:Di2015NewLine    Dequeue the queue to obtain the current item.Di2015NewLine    Is the interval empty? If so, skip this intervalDi2015NewLine    Otherwise, the interval has a GLB, a LUB, and a value in the middle.Di2015NewLine    Yield the middle of the intervalDi2015NewLine    Enqueue the interval (bottom, middle)Di2015NewLine    Enqueue the interval (middle, top)Di2015NewLine
8220374Di2015UniqueSeparatorABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQ
8220374Di2015UniqueSeparatorYield ADi2015NewLineYield QDi2015NewLineEnqueue A-Q. The queue is now A-QDi2015NewLineIs the queue empty? No.Di2015NewLineDequeue the queue. It is now empty.Di2015NewLinecurrent is A-QDi2015NewLineIs the current interval empty? no.Di2015NewLineThe middle is I.Di2015NewLineYield I.Di2015NewLineEnqueue A-I. The queue is now A-I.Di2015NewLineEnqueue I-Q. The queue is now A-I, I-Q.Di2015NewLineIs the queue empty? No.Di2015NewLineDequeue the queue. It is now I-Q.Di2015NewLinecurrent is A-I.Di2015NewLineIs the current interval empty? No.Di2015NewLineThe middle is E.Di2015NewLineYield E.Di2015NewLineEnqueue A-E. The queue is now I-Q, A-E.Di2015NewLineEnqueue E-I. The queue is now I-Q, A-E, E-IDi2015NewLineIs the queue empty? No.Di2015NewLineDequeue. The queue is now A-E, E-IDi2015NewLinecurrent is I-QDi2015NewLineThe middle is MDi2015NewLineYield M.Di2015NewLineEnqueue I-MDi2015NewLineEnqueue M-Q.  The queue is now A-E, E-I, I-M, M-QDi2015NewLineOK, let's start skipping some steps here. The state of the queue and the yields are:Di2015NewLineYield CDi2015NewLineE-I, I-M, M-Q, A-C, C-EDi2015NewLineYield GDi2015NewLineI-M, M-Q, A-C, C-E, E-G, G-IDi2015NewLineYield KDi2015NewLineM-Q, A-C, C-E, E-G, G-I, I-K, K-MDi2015NewLineyield ODi2015NewLineA-C, C-E, E-G, G-I, I-K, K-M, M-O, O-QDi2015NewLineyield BDi2015NewLineC-E, E-G, G-I, I-K, K-M, M-O, O-Q, A-B, B-CDi2015NewLineOK, skip more steps...Di2015NewLineYield D, F, H, J, L, N, PDi2015NewLineQueue is now A-B, B-C, C-D, D-E, ... P-QDi2015NewLineEvery interval is now empty, so we skip all of htem and we are done.Di2015NewLine
8220374Di2015UniqueSeparatorABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQDi2015NewLine        IDi2015NewLine    E       MDi2015NewLine  C   G   K   ODi2015NewLine B D F H J L N PDi2015NewLineA               Q  Di2015NewLine

8221181Di2015UniqueSeparator    bool IsInDaylightSavingsTime(DateTime date)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // get second sunday in marchDi2015NewLine        DateTime _tempDateMar = new DateTime(date.Year, 3, 1);Di2015NewLine        int secondSunDayInMar = (8 - (int)_tempDateMar.DayOfWeek) + 7;Di2015NewLine        _tempDateMar = new DateTime(date.Year, 3, secondSunDayInMar, 2, 0, 0);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //get first sunday in novemberDi2015NewLine        DateTime _tempDateNov = new DateTime(date.Year, 11, 1);Di2015NewLine        int firstSunDayInNov = (8 - (int)_tempDateNov.DayOfWeek);Di2015NewLine        _tempDateNov = new DateTime(date.Year, 11, firstSunDayInNov, 2, 0, 0);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return (date >= _tempDateMar && date <= _tempDateNov);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

8221645Di2015UniqueSeparator    public class SlidingStream : StreamDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    #region Other stream member implementationsDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    ...Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #endregion Other stream member implementationsDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public SlidingStream()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        ReadTimeout = -1;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private readonly object _writeSyncRoot = new object();Di2015NewLine    private readonly object _readSyncRoot = new object();Di2015NewLine    private readonly LinkedList<ArraySegment<byte>> _pendingSegments = new LinkedList<ArraySegment<byte>>();Di2015NewLine    private readonly ManualResetEventSlim _dataAvailableResetEvent = new ManualResetEventSlim();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public int ReadTimeout { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override int Read(byte[] buffer, int offset, int count)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (_dataAvailableResetEvent.Wait(ReadTimeout))Di2015NewLine            throw new TimeoutException("No data available");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        lock (_readSyncRoot)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int currentCount = 0;Di2015NewLine            int currentOffset = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            while (currentCount != count)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                ArraySegment<byte> segment = _pendingSegments.First.Value;Di2015NewLine                _pendingSegments.RemoveFirst();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                int index = segment.Offset;Di2015NewLine                for (; index < segment.Count; index++)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    if (currentOffset < offset)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        currentOffset++;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    elseDi2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        buffer[currentCount] = segment.Array[index];Di2015NewLine                        currentCount++;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (currentCount == count)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    if (index < segment.Offset + segment.Count)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        _pendingSegments.AddFirst(new ArraySegment<byte>(segment.Array, index, segment.Offset + segment.Count - index));Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (_pendingSegments.Count == 0)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    _dataAvailableResetEvent.Reset();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    return currentCount;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return currentCount;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override void Write(byte[] buffer, int offset, int count)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        lock (_writeSyncRoot)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            byte[] copy = new byte[count];Di2015NewLine            Array.Copy(buffer, offset, copy, 0, count);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            _pendingSegments.AddLast(new ArraySegment<byte>(copy));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            _dataAvailableResetEvent.Set();Di2015NewLine        }   Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

8222977Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass FooAttribute : ValidationAttributeDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly int minLength, maxLength;Di2015NewLine    public FooAttribute(int minLength, int maxLength) : this(minLength, maxLength, "Invalid ASCII/unicode string-length") {}Di2015NewLine    public FooAttribute(int minLength, int maxLength, string errorMessage) : base(errorMessage)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.minLength = minLength;Di2015NewLine        this.maxLength = maxLength;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected override ValidationResult IsValid(object value, ValidationContext ctx)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if(value == null) return ValidationResult.Success;Di2015NewLine        var s = value as string;Di2015NewLine        if(s == null) return new ValidationResult("Not a string");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        bool hasNonAscii = s.Any(c => c >= 128);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int effectiveLength = hasNonAscii ? 8223477Di2015UniqueSeparatorfunction CheckEmail(address){Di2015NewLine    address=address.replace(/(^\\s*)|(\\s*$)/g, "");Di2015NewLine    var reg=/([\\w._-])+@([\\w_-])+(\\.([\\w_-])+){1,2}/;Di2015NewLine    var matcharr=reg.exec(address);Di2015NewLine    if(matcharr!=null){Di2015NewLine        if(matcharr[0].length==address.length){Di2015NewLine            return true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return false;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return false;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineeg:Di2015NewLinevar sVal=" t.st@gmail.com.cn ";Di2015NewLinevar sVal2=" t.st@gmail.com.cn.abc ";Di2015NewLineconsole.log(CheckEmail("name@server.com"));    //outpus trueDi2015NewLineconsole.log(CheckEmail("@server.com"));   //outpus falseDi2015NewLine

modules = new OrderingCollection<IModule, IOrderMetadata>(lazyRule => lazyRule.Metadata.Order);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private CompositionContainer container;Di2015NewLine    private bool isInitialized = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Gets available application modules (add-ins)Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public List<IModule>                      .ToList();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        this.isInitialized = true;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Initialize {Di2015NewLine            oModule.Initialize();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Injects dependencies in specified containerDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="host">Container to inject in</param>Di2015NewLine    public void Compose(object host)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (host == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentNullException();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine modulesDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public void RegisterViews()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.EnsureInitialize();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (IModule oModule in this.Modules)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            foreach (Uri oUri in oModule.GetViewPath().ToArray())Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                ResourceDictionary oDictionary = new ResourceDictionary();Di2015NewLine                oDictionary.Source = oUri;Di2015NewLine                Application.Current.Resources.MergedDictionaries.Add(oDictionary);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Get catalog for modules loadDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="assembly">Assembly to search modules</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns>Catalog for modules Path.GetDirectoryName(assembly.Location);Di2015NewLine        DirectoryCatalog oDirCatalog = new DirectoryCatalog(sDirName, "Company.*");Di2015NewLine        AssemblyCatalog oAssemblyCatalog = new AssemblyCatalog(assembly);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        AggregateCatalog oCatalog = new AggregateCatalog(oAssemblyCatalog, oDirCatalog);Di2015NewLine        return oCatalog;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Ensure if manager was initializedDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    private void EnsureInitialize()Di2015NewLine }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

8228331Di2015UniqueSeparator    private void DeleteCells(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // create excel-instance:Di2015NewLine        Excel.Application excel = new Excel.Application();Di2015NewLine        // open the concrete file:Di2015NewLine        Excel.Workbook excelWorkbook = excel.Workbooks.Open(@"D:\\test.xls");Di2015NewLine        // select worksheet. 8228463Di2015UniqueSeparator    public double ConvertMeasure(string measure)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        measure = measure.ToLower().Replace(" ", "");Di2015NewLine        measure = measure.Substring(0, measure.Length - 1);Di2015NewLine        char m = measure.Last();Di2015NewLine        if (char.IsDigit(m))Di2015NewLine            return double.Parse(measure, CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        double ret = double.Parse(measure.Substring(0, measure.Length - 1),Di2015NewLine                                  CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);Di2015NewLine        switch (m)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            case 'm': return ret / 1E3;Di2015NewLine            case 'u': return ret / 1E6;Di2015NewLine            case 'n': return ret / 1E9;Di2015NewLine            case 'p': return ret / 1E12;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return ret;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
