8236139Di2015UniqueSeparator        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="ipAddress"></param>Di2015NewLine        /// <remarks>A null or empty string passed as the ipAddress will return true. An invalid ipAddress will be returned as true. </remarks>Di2015NewLine        /// <returns></returns>Di2015NewLine        public static bool IsNonRoutableIpAddress(string ipAddress)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //Reference: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Reserved_IP_addressesDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //if the ip address string is empty or null string, we consider it to be non-routableDi2015NewLine            if (String.IsNullOrEmpty(ipAddress))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return true;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //if we cannot parse the Ipaddress, then we consider it non-routableDi2015NewLine            IPAddress tempIpAddress = null;Di2015NewLine            if (!IPAddress.TryParse(ipAddress, out tempIpAddress))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return true;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            byte[] ipAddressBytes = tempIpAddress.GetAddressBytes();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //if ipAddress is IPv4Di2015NewLine            if (tempIpAddress.AddressFamily == System.Net.Sockets.AddressFamily.InterNetwork)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (IsIpAddressInRange(ipAddressBytes, "10.0.0.0/8")) //Class A Private network checkDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    return true;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                else if (IsIpAddressInRange(ipAddressBytes, "172.16.0.0/12")) //Class B private network checkDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    return true;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                else if (IsIpAddressInRange(ipAddressBytes, "192.168.0.0/16")) //Class C private network checkDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    return true;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                else if (IsIpAddressInRange(ipAddressBytes, "127.0.0.0/8")) //LoopbackDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    return true;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                else if (IsIpAddressInRange(ipAddressBytes, "0.0.0.0/8"))   //reserved for broadcast messagesDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    return true;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                //its routable if its ipv4 and meets none of the criteriaDi2015NewLine                return false;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            //if ipAddress is IPv6Di2015NewLine            else if (tempIpAddress.AddressFamily == System.Net.Sockets.AddressFamily.InterNetworkV6)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                //incompleteDi2015NewLine                if (IsIpAddressInRange(ipAddressBytes, "::/128"))       //Unspecified addressDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    return true;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                else if (IsIpAddressInRange(ipAddressBytes, "::1/128"))     //lookback address for localhostDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    return true;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                else if (IsIpAddressInRange(ipAddressBytes, "2001:db8::/32"))   //Addresses used in documentationDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    return true;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                return false;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                //we default to non-routable if its not Ipv4 or Ipv6Di2015NewLine                return true;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="ipAddressBytes"></param>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="reservedIpAddress"></param>Di2015NewLine        /// <returns></returns>Di2015NewLine        private static bool IsIpAddressInRange(byte[] ipAddressBytes, string reservedIpAddress)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (String.IsNullOrEmpty(reservedIpAddress))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return false;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (ipAddressBytes == null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return false;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //Split the reserved ip address into a bitmask and ip addressDi2015NewLine            string[] ipAddressSplit = reservedIpAddress.Split(new char[] { '/' }, StringSplitOptions.RemoveEmptyEntries);Di2015NewLine            if (ipAddressSplit.Length != 2)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return false;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            string ipAddressRange = ipAddressSplit[0];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            IPAddress ipAddress = null;Di2015NewLine            if (!IPAddress.TryParse(ipAddressRange, out ipAddress))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return false;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Convert the IP address to bytes.Di2015NewLine            byte[] ipBytes = ipAddress.GetAddressBytes();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //parse the bitsDi2015NewLine            int bits = 0;Di2015NewLine            if (!int.TryParse(ipAddressSplit[1], out bits))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                bits = 0;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // BitConverter gives bytes in opposite order to GetAddressBytes().Di2015NewLine            byte[] maskBytes = null;Di2015NewLine            if (ipAddress.AddressFamily == AddressFamily.InterNetwork)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                uint mask = ~(uint.MaxValue >> bits);Di2015NewLine                maskBytes = BitConverter.GetBytes(mask).Reverse().ToArray();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            else if (ipAddress.AddressFamily == AddressFamily.InterNetworkV6)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                //128 placesDi2015NewLine                BitArray bitArray = new BitArray(128, false);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                //shift <bits> times to the rightDi2015NewLine                ShiftRight(bitArray, bits, true);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                //turn into byte arrayDi2015NewLine                maskBytes = ConvertToByteArray(bitArray).Reverse().ToArray();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            bool result = true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //CalculateDi2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < ipBytes.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                result &= (byte)(ipAddressBytes[i] & maskBytes[i]) == ipBytes[i];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return result;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="bitArray"></param>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="shiftN"></param>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="fillValue"></param>Di2015NewLine        private static void ShiftRight(BitArray bitArray, int shiftN, bool fillValue)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            for (int i = shiftN; i < bitArray.Count; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                bitArray[i - shiftN] = bitArray[i];Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //fill the shifted bits as falseDi2015NewLine            for (int index = bitArray.Count - shiftN; index < bitArray.Count; index++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                bitArray[index] = fillValue;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="bitArray"></param>Di2015NewLine        /// <returns></returns>Di2015NewLine        private static byte[] ConvertToByteArray(BitArray bitArray)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // pack (in this case, using the first bool as the lsb - if you wantDi2015NewLine            // the first bool as the msb, reverse things ;-p)Di2015NewLine            int bytes = (bitArray.Length + 7) / 8;Di2015NewLine            byte[] arr2 = new byte[bytes];Di2015NewLine            int bitIndex = 0;Di2015NewLine            int byteIndex = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < bitArray.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (bitArray[i])Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    arr2[byteIndex] |= (byte)(1 << bitIndex);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                bitIndex++;Di2015NewLine                if (bitIndex == 8)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    bitIndex = 0;Di2015NewLine                    byteIndex++;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return arr2;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine

8240132Di2015UniqueSeparator[WebInvoke(Method = "POST", UriTemplate = "{importFile}")]Di2015NewLinepublic HttpResponseMessage Upload(Di2015NewLine    string importFile, HttpRequestMessage request)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (!request.Content.IsMimeMultipartContent())Di2015NewLine        throw new HttpResponseException(HttpStatusCode.UnsupportedMediaType);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Read the MIME multipart content Di2015NewLine    var task = request.Content.ReadAsMultipartAsync();            Di2015NewLine    task.Wait();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    IEnumerable<HttpContent> bodyparts = task.Result;Di2015NewLine    string submitter;Di2015NewLine    if (!bodyparts.TryGetFormFieldValue("submitter", out submitter))Di2015NewLine        submitter = "unknown";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var parser = this.parserFactoryFactory.CreateParser();Di2015NewLine    foreach (var part in bodyparts)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        using (var stream = part.ContentReadStream)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            using (var streamReader = new StreamReader(stream))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                string content = streamReader.ReadToEnd();Di2015NewLine                var results = parser.Parse(content);Di2015NewLine                if (results.IsValid)Di2015NewLine                    // do somethingDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    var message = new HttpResponseMessage(HttpStatusCode.Accepted);Di2015NewLine    return message;Di2015NewLine}  Di2015NewLine

8243493Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static void Test()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    string xmlData = "<root><Name1 Type=\\"System.String\\">Value1</Name1><Name2 Type=\\"System.Int32\\">324</Name2></root>";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    List<DataField> dataFieldList = DataField.ConvertXML(xmlData);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Debug.Assert(dataFieldList.Count == 2);Di2015NewLine    Debug.Assert(dataFieldList[0].GetType() == typeof(DataField<string>));Di2015NewLine    Debug.Assert(dataFieldList[1].GetType() == typeof(DataField<int>));Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic abstract class DataFieldDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public string Name { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Instanciate a generic DataField<T> given an XElementDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public static DataField CreateDataField(XElement element)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //Determine the type of element we deal withDi2015NewLine        string elementTypeName = element.Attribute("Type").Value;Di2015NewLine        Type elementType = Type.GetType(elementTypeName);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Instanciate a new Generic element of type: DataField<T>Di2015NewLine        dynamic dataField = Activator.CreateInstance(typeof(DataField<>).MakeGenericType(elementType));Di2015NewLine        dataField.Name = element.Name.ToString();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Convert the inner value to the target element typeDi2015NewLine        dynamic value = Convert.ChangeType(element.Value, elementType);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Set the value into DataFieldDi2015NewLine        dataField.Value = value;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return dataField;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Take all the descendant of the root node and creates a DataField for eachDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public static List<DataField> ConvertXML(string xmlData)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var result = (from d in XDocument.Parse(xmlData).Root.DescendantNodes().OfType<XElement>()Di2015NewLine                      select CreateDataField(d)).ToList();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return result;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class DataField<T> : DataFieldDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public T Value { get; set; }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
8243499Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void dataGridView1_MouseDown(object sender, MouseEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Get the index of the item the mouse is below.Di2015NewLine    rowIndexFromMouseDown = dataGridView1.HitTest(e.X, e.Y).RowIndex;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Here we also check that the HitTest happened on a RowHeaderDi2015NewLine    if (rowIndexFromMouseDown != -1 && (dataGridView1.HitTest(e.X, e.Y).Type == DataGridViewHitTestType.RowHeader))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Remember the point where the mouse down occurred. Di2015NewLine     // The DragSize indicates the size that the mouse can move Di2015NewLine     // before a drag event should be started.                Di2015NewLine        Size dragSize = SystemInformation.DragSize;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Create a rectangle using the DragSize, with the mouse position beingDi2015NewLine        // at the center of the rectangle.Di2015NewLine        dragBoxFromMouseDown = new Rectangle(new Point(e.X - (dragSize.Width / 2),Di2015NewLine                                                       e.Y - (dragSize.Height / 2)),Di2015NewLine                            dragSize);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine        // Reset the rectangle if the mouse is not over an item in the ListBox.Di2015NewLine        dragBoxFromMouseDown = Rectangle.Empty;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

8246495Di2015UniqueSeparator    public static IEnumerable<Food> InterleaveFoods(IEnumerable<Food> source)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var groups = (from food in sourceDi2015NewLine                      group food by food.idType into foodGroupDi2015NewLine                      orderby foodGroup.KeyDi2015NewLine                      select foodGroup.ToArray())Di2015NewLine                     .ToList();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int i = 0;Di2015NewLine        while (groups.Any())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            for (int group = 0; group < groups.Count; group++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (i < groups[group].Length)Di2015NewLine                    yield return groups[group][i];Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    // group is empty; remove itDi2015NewLine                    groups.RemoveAt(group);Di2015NewLine                    group--;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            i++;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

8247373Di2015UniqueSeparator// Implement a visitorDi2015NewLinepublic class ImathasVisitor: LogicalExpressionVisitorDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  // Result contains the imathas expressionDi2015NewLine  // after the visit.Di2015NewLine  public StringBuilder Result = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public override void Visit(Function function)Di2015NewLine  {                Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public override void Visit(LogicalExpression expression)Di2015NewLine  {                Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public override void Visit(TernaryExpression expression)Di2015NewLine  {                Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public override void Visit(UnaryExpression expression)Di2015NewLine  {                Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public override void Visit(Identifier identifier)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    Result.AppendFormat("{{{0}}}", identifier.Name);Di2015NewLine  }           Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public override void Visit(ValueExpression expression)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    Result.AppendFormat("{{{0}}}", expression.Value);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public override void Visit(BinaryExpression expression)Di2015NewLine  {                                Di2015NewLine    switch(expression.Type)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      case BinaryExpressionType.Div:Di2015NewLine        Result.Append("\\\\frac{");Di2015NewLine        expression.LeftExpression.Accept(this);Di2015NewLine        Result.Append("}{");Di2015NewLine        expression.RightExpression.Accept(this);Di2015NewLine        Result.Append("}");Di2015NewLine        break;Di2015NewLine      case BinaryExpressionType.Plus:Di2015NewLine        expression.LeftExpression.Accept(this);               Di2015NewLine        Result.Append(HttpUtility.UrlEncode("+"));Di2015NewLine        expression.RightExpression.Accept(this);                Di2015NewLine        break;Di2015NewLine      case BinaryExpressionType.Minus:Di2015NewLine        expression.LeftExpression.Accept(this);               Di2015NewLine        Result.Append("-");Di2015NewLine        expression.RightExpression.Accept(this);                Di2015NewLine        break;Di2015NewLine    }                                                Di2015NewLine  }           Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestatic void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  // Create a NCalc expression.Di2015NewLine  NCalc.Expression e = new NCalc.Expression("x + 1/y");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  // Check for syntax errors.Di2015NewLine  if(e.HasErrors())Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    Console.Out.WriteLine("Syntax error.");Di2015NewLine    return;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  // Transform the parsed expression intoDi2015NewLine  // an imathas expression.Di2015NewLine  ImathasVisitor iv = new ImathasVisitor();Di2015NewLine  e.ParsedExpression.Accept(iv);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  Console.Out.WriteLine(iv.Result);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

8247954Di2015UniqueSeparator        private bool AddGifFrames(Image image)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // implementationDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var fd = new FrameDimension(image.FrameDimensionsList[0]);Di2015NewLine        int frameCount = image.GetFrameCount(fd);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var frames = new List<Tuple<int, Image>>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (frameCount > 1)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            frames = new List<Tuple<int, Image>>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //0x5100 is the property id of the GIF frame's durationsDi2015NewLine            //this property does not exist when frameCount <= 1Di2015NewLine            byte[] times = image.GetPropertyItem(0x5100).Value;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < frameCount; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                //selects GIF frame based on FrameDimension and frameIndexDi2015NewLine                image.SelectActiveFrame(fd, i);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                //length in milliseconds of display durationDi2015NewLine                int length = BitConverter.ToInt32(times, 4 * i);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                //save currect image frame as new bitmapDi2015NewLine                frames.Add(new Tuple<int, Image>(length, new Bitmap(image)));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        } // Not animatedDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (var frame in frames)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            HandleFrame(frame.Item2, frame.Item1);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return true;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
8247954Di2015UniqueSeparator        protected void WriteGraphicCtrlExt(int? delay)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Fs.WriteByte(0x21); // extension introducerDi2015NewLine        Fs.WriteByte(0xf9); // GCE labelDi2015NewLine        Fs.WriteByte(4); // data block sizeDi2015NewLine        int transp, disp;Di2015NewLine        if (Transparent == Color.Empty)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            transp = 0;Di2015NewLine            disp = 0; // dispose = no actionDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            transp = 1;Di2015NewLine            disp = 2; // force clear if using transparent colorDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if (Dispose >= 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            disp = Dispose & 7; // user overrideDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        disp <<= 2;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // packed fieldsDi2015NewLine        Fs.WriteByte(Convert.ToByte(0 | // 1:3 reservedDi2015NewLine                                    disp | // 4:6 disposalDi2015NewLine                                    0 | // 7   user input - 0 = noneDi2015NewLine                                    transp)); // 8   transparency flagDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        WriteShort(delay ?? Delay); // delay x 1/100 secDi2015NewLine        Fs.WriteByte(Convert.ToByte(TransIndex)); // transparent color indexDi2015NewLine        Fs.WriteByte(0); // block terminatorDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

8251184Di2015UniqueSeparator    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var list = new List<String>()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            "child.child2.child3",Di2015NewLine            "child7",Di2015NewLine            "child10.child14.child15",Di2015NewLine            "child10.child14.child16"Di2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var matrix = new List<List<String>>();Di2015NewLine        foreach (var line in list)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            matrix.Add(line.Split('.').ToList());Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        StringBuilder html = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine        WriteLevel(html, matrix, 0);Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(html.ToString());Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static void WriteLevel(StringBuilder html, List<List<String>> matrix, int level)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var nodes = from node in matrixDi2015NewLine                    where node.Count > levelDi2015NewLine                    group node by node[level] into groupingDi2015NewLine                    select grouping;Di2015NewLine        if (nodes.Count() > 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            html.Append("<ul>");Di2015NewLine            foreach (var node in nodes)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                html.Append("<li>");Di2015NewLine                html.Append(node.Key);Di2015NewLine                WriteLevel(html, node.ToList(), level + 1);Di2015NewLine                html.Append("</li>");Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            html.Append("</ul>");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
